[I]669-i have been laughing at [them]2451-the four greatest quizzers in the room this half hour . ”[669-i]

Again [Catherine]73-catherine excused [herself]73-catherine ; and at last [he]669-i walked off to quiz [[his]669-i sisters]670-his sisters by [himself]669-i . The rest of the evening [she]671-her found very dull ; [Mr. Tilney]92-henry was drawn away from [their]672-their party at tea , to attend that of [[his]92-henry partner]673-his partner ; [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney , though belonging to [it]674-it , did not sit near [her]671-her , and [James]103-james and [Isabella]101-isabella were so much engaged in conversing together that [the latter]562-the latter had no leisure to bestow more on [[her]671-her friend]305-her friend than one smile , one squeeze , and one “ dearest [Catherine]73-catherine . ”[562-the latter]

CHAPTER 9

The progress of [Catherine]73-catherine ’s unhappiness from the events of the evening was as follows . It appeared first in a general dissatisfaction with [everybody]318-everybody about [her]671-her , while [she]671-her remained in [the rooms]2184-the rooms , which speedily brought on considerable weariness and a violent desire to go [home]2403-home . This , on arriving in [Pulteney Street]7-pulteney street , took the direction of extraordinary hunger , and when that was appeased , changed into an earnest longing to be in bed ; such was the extreme point of [her]671-her distress ; for when there [she]671-her immediately fell into a sound sleep which lasted nine hours , and from which [she]671-her awoke perfectly revived , in excellent spirits , with fresh hopes and fresh schemes . The first wish of [her]671-her heart was to improve [her]671-her acquaintance with [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney , and almost [her]671-her first resolution , to seek [her]671-her for that purpose , in [the pump - room]357-the pump - room at noon . In [the pump - room]357-the pump - room , one so newly arrived in [Bath]5-bath must be met with , and that building [she]671-her had already found so favourable for the discovery of female excellence , and the completion of female intimacy , so admirably adapted for secret discourses and unlimited confidence , that [she]671-her was most reasonably encouraged to expect [another friend]682-another friend from within [its]357-the pump - room walls . [Her]671-her plan for the morning thus settled , [she]671-her sat quietly down to [her]671-her book after breakfast , resolving to remain in the same place and the same employment till the clock struck one ; and from habitude very little incommoded by the remarks and ejaculations of [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen , whose vacancy of mind and incapacity for thinking were such , that as [she]671-her never talked a great deal , so [she]671-her could never be entirely silent ; and , therefore , while [she]671-her sat at [her]671-her work , if [she]671-her lost [her]671-her needle or broke [her]671-her thread , if [she]671-her heard [a carriage]683-a carriage in [the street]444-the street , or saw a speck upon [her]671-her gown , [she]671-her must observe it aloud , whether there were anyone at leisure to answer [her]671-her or not . At about half past twelve , a remarkably loud rap drew [her]671-her in haste to the window , and scarcely had [she]671-her time to inform [Catherine]73-catherine of there being two open carriages at the door , in the first only [a servant]685-a servant , [[her]671-her brother]2287-her brother driving [Miss Thorpe]95-miss thorpe in the second , before [John Thorpe]97-john came running [upstairs]443-upstairs , calling out , “ Well , [Miss Morland]84-miss morland , here [I]97-john am . Have [you]84-miss morland been waiting long ? [We]2455-we could not come before ; [the old devil of a coachmaker]2456-the old devil of a coachmaker was such an eternity finding out a thing fit to be got into , and now it is ten thousand to one but [they]2457-they break down before [we]2455-we are out of [the street]444-the street . How do [you]84-miss morland do , [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ? A famous ball last night , was not it ? Come , [Miss Morland]84-miss morland , be quick , for [the others]2286-the others are in a confounded hurry to be off . [They]2286-the others want to get [their]2286-the others tumble over . ”[97-john]

“ What do [you]84-miss morland mean ? ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine . “ Where are [you]2455-we all going to ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Going to ? Why , [you]84-miss morland have not forgot [our]2455-we engagement ! did not [we]2455-we agree together to take a drive this morning ? What a head [you]84-miss morland have ! [we]2455-we are going up [Claverton Down]28-claverton down . ”[97-john]

“ Something was said about it , [I]73-catherine remember , ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine , looking at [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen for [her]688-her opinion ; “ but really [I]73-catherine did not expect [you]86-mrs. allen . ”[73-catherine]

“ Not expect [me]688-her ! that ’s a good one ! and what a dust [you]86-mrs. allen would have made , if [I]688-her had not come . ”[688-her]

[Catherine]73-catherine ’s silent appeal to [[her]688-her friend]305-her friend , meanwhile , was entirely thrown away , for [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen , not being at all in the habit of conveying any expression [herself]86-mrs. allen by a look , was not aware of its being ever intended by [anybody else]2325-anybody else ; and [Catherine]73-catherine , whose desire of seeing [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney again could at that moment bear a short delay in favour of a drive , and who thought there could be no impropriety in [her]688-her going with [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe , as [Isabella]101-isabella was going at the same time with [James]103-james , was therefore obliged to speak plainer . “ Well , [ma’am]2460-ma’am , what do [you]2460-ma’am say to it ? Can [you]2460-ma’am spare [me]119-mr. thorpe for an hour or two ? Shall [I]119-mr. thorpe go ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Do just as [you]2460-ma’am please , [[my]86-mrs. allen dear]2185-my dear , ”[86-mrs. allen] replied [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen , with the most placid indifference . [Catherine]73-catherine took the advice , and ran off to get ready . In a very few minutes [she]688-her reappeared , having scarcely allowed [the two others]691-the two others time enough to get through a few short sentences in [her]688-her praise , after [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe had procured [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ’s admiration of [his]119-mr. thorpe gig ; and then receiving [[her]688-her friend]305-her friend ’s parting good wishes , [they]691-the two others both hurried [downstairs]693-downstairs . “ [[My]101-isabella dearest]2292-my dearest creature , ”[101-isabella] cried [Isabella]101-isabella , to whom the duty of friendship immediately called [her]688-her before [she]688-her could get into [the carriage]558-the carriage , “ [you]2292-my dearest have been at least three hours getting ready . [I]101-isabella was afraid [you]2292-my dearest were ill . What a delightful ball [we]691-the two others had last night . [I]101-isabella have a thousand things to say to [you]2292-my dearest ; but make haste and get in , for [I]101-isabella long to be off . ”[101-isabella]

[Catherine]73-catherine followed [her]305-her friend orders and turned away , but not too soon to hear [[her]688-her friend]305-her friend exclaim aloud to [James]103-james , “ What [a sweet girl]2304-a sweet girl [she]2304-a sweet girl is ! [i]103-james quite dote on [her]2304-a sweet girl . ”[103-james]

“ [You]73-catherine will not be frightened , [Miss Morland]84-miss morland , ”[119-mr. thorpe] said [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe , as [he]119-mr. thorpe handed [her]688-her in , “ if [my]119-mr. thorpe horse should dance about a little at first setting off . [He]119-mr. thorpe will , most likely , give a plunge or two , and perhaps take the rest for a minute ; but [he]119-mr. thorpe will soon know [[his]119-mr. thorpe master]2464-his master . [He]119-mr. thorpe is full of spirits , playful as can be , but there is no vice in [him]119-mr. thorpe . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

[Catherine]73-catherine did not think the portrait a very inviting one , but it was too late to retreat , and [she]688-her was too young to own [herself]688-her frightened ; so , resigning [herself]688-her to [her]688-her fate , and trusting to the animal ’s boasted knowledge of [its owner]696-its owner , [she]688-her sat peaceably down , and saw [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe sit down by [her]688-her . Everything being then arranged , [the servant who stood at the horse]697-the servant who stood at the horse ’s head was bid in an important voice “ to let [him]569-her companion go , ”[697-the servant who stood at the horse] and off [they]698-they went in the quietest manner imaginable , without a plunge or a caper , or anything like one . [Catherine]73-catherine , delighted at so happy an escape , spoke [her]688-her pleasure aloud with grateful surprise ; and [[her]688-her companion]569-her companion immediately made the matter perfectly simple by assuring [her]688-her that it was entirely owing to the peculiarly judicious manner in which [he]569-her companion had then held the reins , and the singular discernment and dexterity with which [he]569-her companion had directed [his]569-her companion whip . [Catherine]73-catherine , though [she]688-her could not help wondering that with such perfect command of [his]569-her companion horse , [he]569-her companion should think it necessary to alarm [her]688-her with a relation of [its]700-its tricks , congratulated [herself]688-her sincerely on being under the care of so excellent [a coachman]701-a coachman ; and perceiving that the animal continued to go on in the same quiet manner , without showing the smallest propensity towards any unpleasant vivacity , and ( considering its inevitable pace was ten miles an hour ) by no means alarmingly fast , gave [herself]688-her up to all the enjoyment of air and exercise of the most invigorating kind , in a fine mild day of February , with the consciousness of safety . A silence of several minutes succeeded [their]698-they first short dialogue ; it was broken by [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe ’s saying very abruptly , “ [Old Allen]126-old allen is as rich as [a Jew]2465-a jew — is not [he]126-old allen ? ”[569-her companion] [Catherine]73-catherine did not understand [him]569-her companion — and [he]569-her companion repeated [his]569-her companion question , adding in explanation , “ [Old Allen]126-old allen , [the man [you]73-catherine are with]2466-the man you are with . ”[569-her companion]

“ Oh ! [mr . Allen]86-mrs. allen , [you]569-her companion mean . Yes , [I]569-her companion believe , [he]126-old allen is very rich . ”[569-her companion]

“ And [no children]2467-no children at all ? ”[569-her companion]

“ No — not any . ”[569-her companion]

“ A famous thing for [his]126-old allen next heirs . [He]126-old allen is _ [[your]73-catherine _ godfather]2468-your _ godfather , is not [he]126-old allen ? ”[569-her companion]

“ [[My]569-her companion godfather]2469-my godfather ! no . ”[569-her companion]

“ But [you]569-her companion are always very much with [them]2470-them . ”[569-her companion]

“ Yes , very much . ”[569-her companion]

“ Aye , that is what [I]569-her companion meant . [He]126-old allen seems a good kind of old fellow enough , and has lived very well in [his]126-old allen time , [I]569-her companion dare say ; [he]126-old allen is not gouty for nothing . Does [he]126-old allen drink [his]126-old allen bottle a day now ? ”[569-her companion]

“ [His]126-old allen bottle a day ! no . Why should [you]569-her companion think of such a thing ? [He]126-old allen is [a very temperate man]2471-a very temperate man , and [you]569-her companion could not fancy [him]126-old allen in liquor last night ? ”[569-her companion]

“ [Lord]2472-lord help [you]569-her companion ! [[you]569-her companion women]2473-you women are always thinking of [men]2253-men ’s being in liquor . Why , [you]569-her companion do not suppose [a man]2335-a man is overset by a bottle ? [I]569-her companion am sure of _ this_—that if [everybody]318-everybody was to drink [their]318-everybody bottle a day , there would not be half the disorders in [the world]191-the world there are now . It would be a famous good thing for [us]2478-us all . ”[569-her companion]

“ [I]569-her companion can not believe it . ”[569-her companion]

“ Oh ! [lord]2368-lord , it would be the saving of thousands . There is not the hundredth part of the wine consumed in [this kingdom]2480-this kingdom that there ought to be . [Our]2478-us foggy climate wants help . ”[569-her companion]

“ And yet [I]569-her companion have heard that there is a great deal of wine drunk in [Oxford]10-oxford . ”[569-her companion]

“ [Oxford]10-oxford ! there is no drinking at [Oxford]10-oxford now , [I]569-her companion assure [you]569-her companion . [Nobody]2205-nobody drinks [there]2232-there . [You]569-her companion would hardly meet with [a man who goes beyond [his]2483-a man who goes beyond his four pints at the utmost four pints at the utmost]2483-a man who goes beyond his four pints at the utmost . Now , for instance , it was reckoned a remarkable thing , at the last party in [[my]569-her companion rooms]2484-my rooms , that upon an average [we]2478-us cleared about five pints a head . It was looked upon as something out of the common way . _ [Mine]569-her companion _ is famous good stuff , to be sure . [You]569-her companion would not often meet with anything like it in [Oxford]10-oxford — and that may account for it . But this will just give [you]569-her companion a notion of the general rate of drinking there . ”[569-her companion]

“ Yes , it does give a notion , ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine warmly , “ and that is , that [you]569-her companion all drink a great deal more wine than [I]73-catherine thought [you]569-her companion did . However , [I]73-catherine am sure [James]103-james does not drink so much . ”[73-catherine]

This declaration brought on a loud and overpowering reply , of which no part was very distinct , except the frequent exclamations , amounting almost to oaths , which adorned it , and [Catherine]73-catherine was left , when it ended , with rather a strengthened belief of there being a great deal of wine drunk in [Oxford]10-oxford , and the same happy conviction of [[her]702-she brother]2287-her brother ’s comparative sobriety .

[Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe ’s ideas then all reverted to the merits of [his]119-mr. thorpe own equipage , and [she]702-she was called on to admire the spirit and freedom with which [his]119-mr. thorpe horse moved along , and the ease which [his]119-mr. thorpe paces , as well as the excellence of the springs , gave the motion of [the carriage]558-the carriage . [She]702-she followed [him]119-mr. thorpe in all [his]119-mr. thorpe admiration as well as [she]702-she could . To go before or beyond [him]119-mr. thorpe was impossible . [His]119-mr. thorpe knowledge and [her]702-she ignorance of the subject , [his]119-mr. thorpe rapidity of expression , and [her]702-she diffidence of [herself]702-she put that out of [her]702-she power ; [she]702-she could strike out nothing new in commendation , but [she]702-she readily echoed whatever [he]119-mr. thorpe chose to assert , and it was finally settled between [them]705-we without any difficulty that [his]119-mr. thorpe equipage was altogether the most complete of its kind in [England]2-england , [[his]119-mr. thorpe carriage]706-his carriage the neatest , [his]119-mr. thorpe horse the best goer , and [himself]119-mr. thorpe the best coachman . “ [You]119-mr. thorpe do not really think , [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe , ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine , venturing after some time to consider the matter as entirely decided , and to offer some little variation on the subject , “ that [James]103-james ’s gig will break down ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Break down ! oh , [lord]2368-lord ! did [you]119-mr. thorpe ever see such a little tittuppy thing in [your]119-mr. thorpe life ? There is not a sound piece of iron about it . The wheels have been fairly worn out these ten years at least — and as for the body ! upon [my]73-catherine soul , [you]119-mr. thorpe might shake it to pieces [yourself]119-mr. thorpe with a touch . It is the most devilish little rickety business [I]73-catherine ever beheld ! thank [God]127-god ! [we]705-we have got a better . [I]73-catherine would not be bound to go two miles in it for fifty thousand pounds . ”[73-catherine]

“ Good heavens ! ”[73-catherine] cried [Catherine]73-catherine , quite frightened . “ Then pray let [us]705-we turn back ; [they]2486-they will certainly meet with an accident if [we]705-we go on . Do let [us]705-we turn back , [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe ; stop and speak to [[my]73-catherine brother]2349-my brother , and tell [him]2349-my brother how very unsafe it is . ”[73-catherine]

“ Unsafe ! oh , [lord]2368-lord ! what is there in that ? [They]2486-they will only get a roll if it does break down ; and there is plenty of dirt ; it will be excellent falling . Oh , curse it ! [the carriage]558-the carriage is safe enough , if [a man]2335-a man knows how to drive [it]558-the carriage ; a thing of that sort in good hands will last above twenty years after it is fairly worn out . Lord bless [you]73-catherine ! [i]73-catherine would undertake for five pounds to drive [it]558-the carriage to [York]29-york and back again , without losing a nail . ”[73-catherine]

[Catherine]73-catherine listened with astonishment ; [she]707-her knew not how to reconcile two such very different accounts of the same thing ; for [she]707-her had not been brought up to understand the propensities of a rattle , nor to know to how many idle assertions and impudent falsehoods the excess of vanity will lead . [[Her]707-her own family]708-her own family were [plain , matter - of - fact people who seldom aimed at wit of any kind]709-plain , matter - of - fact people who seldom aimed at wit of any kind ; [[her]707-her father]182-her father , at the utmost , being contented with a pun , and [[her]707-her mother]188-her mother with a proverb ; [they]708-her own family were not in the habit therefore of telling lies to increase [their]708-her own family importance , or of asserting at one moment what [they]708-her own family would contradict the next . [She]707-her reflected on the affair for some time in much perplexity , and was more than once on the point of requesting from [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe a clearer insight into [his]119-mr. thorpe real opinion on the subject ; but [she]707-her checked [herself]707-her , because it appeared to [her]707-her that [he]119-mr. thorpe did not excel in giving those clearer insights , in making those things plain which [he]119-mr. thorpe had before made ambiguous ; and , joining to this , the consideration that [he]119-mr. thorpe would not really suffer [[his]119-mr. thorpe sister]2288-his sister and [[his]119-mr. thorpe friend]556-his friend to be exposed to a danger from which [he]119-mr. thorpe might easily preserve [them]714-them , [she]707-her concluded at last that [he]119-mr. thorpe must know [the carriage]558-the carriage to be in fact perfectly safe , and therefore would alarm [herself]707-her no longer . By [him]119-mr. thorpe the whole matter seemed entirely forgotten ; and all the rest of [his]119-mr. thorpe conversation , or rather talk , began and ended with [himself]119-mr. thorpe and [his]119-mr. thorpe own concerns . [He]119-mr. thorpe told [her]707-her of horses which [he]119-mr. thorpe had bought for a trifle and sold for incredible sums ; of racing matches , in which [his]119-mr. thorpe judgment had infallibly foretold [the winner]716-the winner ; of shooting parties , in which [he]119-mr. thorpe had killed more birds ( though without having one good shot ) than all [[his]119-mr. thorpe companions]717-his companions together ; and described to [her]707-her some famous day ’s sport , with the fox - hounds , in which [his]119-mr. thorpe foresight and skill in directing the dogs had repaired the mistakes of [the most experienced huntsman]718-the most experienced huntsman , and in which the boldness of [his]119-mr. thorpe riding , though it had never endangered [his]119-mr. thorpe own life for a moment , had been constantly leading [others]376-others into difficulties , which [he]119-mr. thorpe calmly concluded had broken the necks of [many]720-many .

Little as [Catherine]73-catherine was in the habit of judging for [herself]73-catherine , and unfixed as were [her]707-her general notions of what [men]2253-men ought to be , [she]707-her could not entirely repress a doubt , while [she]707-her bore with the effusions of [his]119-mr. thorpe endless conceit , of [his]119-mr. thorpe being altogether completely agreeable . It was a bold surmise , for [he]119-mr. thorpe was [[Isabella]101-isabella ’s brother]583-isabella ’s brother ; and [she]707-her had been assured by [James]103-james that [his]119-mr. thorpe manners would recommend [him]119-mr. thorpe to all [her]707-her sex ; but in spite of this , the extreme weariness of [his]119-mr. thorpe company , which crept over [her]707-her before [they]723-they had been out an hour , and which continued unceasingly to increase till [they]723-they stopped in [Pulteney Street]7-pulteney street again , induced [her]707-her , in some small degree , to resist such high authority , and to distrust [his]119-mr. thorpe powers of giving universal pleasure .

When [they]723-they arrived at [[Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ’s door]724-mrs. allen ’s door , the astonishment of [Isabella]101-isabella was hardly to be expressed , on finding that it was too late in the day for [them]723-they to attend [[her]707-her friend]305-her friend into [the house]211-the house : “ Past three o’clock ! ”[305-her friend] It was inconceivable , incredible , impossible ! and [she]707-her would neither believe [her]707-her own watch , nor [[her]707-her brother]2287-her brother ’s , nor [the servant]543-the servant ’s ; [she]707-her would believe no assurance of it founded on reason or reality , till [Morland]103-james produced [his]103-james watch , and ascertained the fact ; to have doubted a moment longer _ then _ , would have been equally inconceivable , incredible , and impossible ; and [she]707-her could only protest , over and over again , that no two hours and a half had ever gone off so swiftly before , as [Catherine]73-catherine was called on to confirm ; [Catherine]73-catherine could not tell a falsehood even to please [Isabella]101-isabella ; but [the latter]562-the latter was spared the misery of [[her]707-her friend]305-her friend ’s dissenting voice , by not waiting for [her]707-her answer . [Her]707-her own feelings entirely engrossed [her]707-her ; [her]707-her wretchedness was most acute on finding [herself]707-her obliged to go directly [home]2403-home . It was ages since [she]707-her had had a moment ’s conversation with [[her]707-her dearest]732-her dearest [Catherine]73-catherine ; and , though [she]707-her had such thousands of things to say to [her]732-her dearest , it appeared as if [they]733-they were never to be together again ; so , with smiles of most exquisite misery , and the laughing eye of utter despondency , [she]707-her bade [[her]707-her friend]305-her friend adieu and went on .

[Catherine]73-catherine found [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen just returned from all the busy idleness of the morning , and was immediately greeted with , “ Well , [[my]707-her dear]2185-my dear , here [you]2185-my dear are , ”[707-her] a truth which [she]707-her had no greater inclination than power to dispute ; “ and [I]707-her hope [you]2185-my dear have had a pleasant airing ? ”[707-her]

“ Yes , [ma’am]2460-ma’am , [I]707-her thank [you]2185-my dear ; [we]2493-we could not have had a nicer day . ”[707-her]

“ So [Mrs. Thorpe]96-mrs. thorpe said ; [she]96-mrs. thorpe was vastly pleased at [your]2185-my dear all going . ”[707-her]

“ [You]2185-my dear have seen [Mrs. Thorpe]96-mrs. thorpe , then ? ”[707-her]

“ Yes , [I]707-her went to [the pump - room]357-the pump - room as soon as [you]2185-my dear were gone , and there [I]707-her met [her]96-mrs. thorpe , and [we]2493-we had a great deal of talk together . [She]96-mrs. thorpe says there was hardly any veal to be got at market this morning , it is so uncommonly scarce . ”[707-her]

“ Did [you]2185-my dear see [anybody else of [our]2493-we acquaintance]2495-anybody else of our acquaintance ? ”[707-her]

“ Yes ; [we]2493-we agreed to take a turn in [the Crescent]2496-the crescent , and there [we]2493-we met [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes , and [Mr.]2497-mr. and [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney walking with [her]96-mrs. thorpe . ”[707-her]

“ Did [you]2185-my dear indeed ? And did [they]2498-they speak to [you]2185-my dear ? ”[707-her]

“ Yes , [we]2493-we walked along [the Crescent]2496-the crescent together for half an hour . [They]2498-they seem [very agreeable people]2500-very agreeable people . [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney was in a very pretty spotted muslin , and [I]707-her fancy , by what [I]707-her can learn , that [she]96-mrs. thorpe always dresses very handsomely . [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes talked to [me]707-her a great deal about [the family]454-the family . ”[707-her]

“ And what did [she]125-mrs. hughes tell [you]2185-my dear of [them]454-the family ? ”[707-her]

“ Oh ! a vast deal indeed ; [she]125-mrs. hughes hardly talked of anything else . ”[707-her]

“ Did [she]125-mrs. hughes tell [you]2185-my dear what part of [Gloucestershire]2502-gloucestershire [they]454-the family come from ? ”[707-her]

“ Yes , [she]125-mrs. hughes did ; but [I]707-her can not recollect now . But [they]454-the family are [very good kind of people]2503-very good kind of people , and very rich . [Mrs. Tilney]128-mrs. tilney was [a Miss Drummond]129-a miss drummond , and [she]128-mrs. tilney and [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes were [schoolfellows]2504-schoolfellows ; and [Miss Drummond]129-a miss drummond had a very large fortune ; and , when [she]129-a miss drummond married , [[her]129-a miss drummond father]182-her father gave [her]129-a miss drummond twenty thousand pounds , and five hundred to buy wedding - clothes . [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes saw all the clothes after [they]454-the family came from [the warehouse]2506-the warehouse . ”[707-her]

“ And are [Mr.]2507-mr. and [Mrs. Tilney]128-mrs. tilney in [Bath]5-bath ? ”[707-her]

“ Yes , [I]707-her fancy [they]454-the family are , but [I]707-her am not quite certain . Upon recollection , however , [I]707-her have a notion [they]454-the family are both dead ; at least [the mother]424-the mother is ; yes , [I]707-her am sure [Mrs. Tilney]128-mrs. tilney is dead , because [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes told [me]707-her there was a very beautiful set of pearls that [Mr. Drummond]130-mr. drummond gave [[his]130-mr. drummond daughter]2509-his daughter on [her]128-mrs. tilney wedding - day and that [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney has got now , for they were put by for [her]128-mrs. tilney when [[her]128-mrs. tilney mother]188-her mother died . ”[707-her]

“ And is [Mr. Tilney]92-henry , [[my]707-her partner]2511-my partner , [the only son]2512-the only son ? ”[707-her]

“ [I]707-her can not be quite positive about that , [[my]707-her dear]2185-my dear ; [I]707-her have some idea [he]92-henry is ; but , however , [he]92-henry is [a very fine young man]2514-a very fine young man , [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes says , and likely to do very well . ”[707-her]

[Catherine]73-catherine inquired no further ; [she]735-you had heard enough to feel that [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen had no real intelligence to give , and that [she]735-you was most particularly unfortunate [herself]735-you in having missed such a meeting with [both brother]736-both brother and [sister]737-sister . Could [she]735-you have foreseen such a circumstance , nothing should have persuaded [her]735-you to go out with [the others]2286-the others ; and , as it was , [she]735-you could only lament [her]735-you ill luck , and think over what [she]735-you had lost , till it was clear to [her]735-you that the drive had by no means been very pleasant and that [John Thorpe]97-john [himself]97-john was quite disagreeable .

CHAPTER 10

[The Allens]104-the allens , [Thorpes]102-the thorpes , and [Morlands]75-the morlands all met in the evening at [the theatre]2218-the theatre ; and , as [Catherine]73-catherine and [Isabella]101-isabella sat together , there was then an opportunity for [the latter]562-the latter to utter some few of the many thousand things which had been collecting within [her]735-you for communication in the immeasurable length of time which had divided [them]741-them . “ Oh , heavens ! [my]735-you beloved [Catherine]73-catherine , have [I]735-you got [you]73-catherine at last ? ”[735-you] was [her]735-you address on [Catherine]73-catherine ’s entering the box and sitting by [her]735-you . “ Now , [Mr. Morland]103-james , ”[742-i] for [he]742-i was close to [her]735-you on the other side , “ [I]742-i shall not speak another word to [you]735-you all the rest of the evening ; so [I]742-i charge [you]735-you not to expect it . [[My]742-i sweetest]2515-my sweetest [Catherine]73-catherine , how have [you]735-you been this long age ? But [I]742-i need not ask [you]735-you , for [you]735-you look delightfully . [You]735-you really have done [your]735-you hair in a more heavenly style than ever ; [you]735-you mischievous creature , do [you]735-you want to attract [everybody]318-everybody ? [I]742-i assure [you]735-you , [[my]742-i brother]2349-my brother is quite in love with [you]735-you already ; and as for [Mr. Tilney]92-henry — but _ that _ is a settled thing — even _ [your]735-you _ modesty can not doubt [his]92-henry attachment now ; [his]92-henry coming back to [Bath]5-bath makes it too plain . Oh ! what would not [I]742-i give to see [him]92-henry ! [I]742-i really am quite wild with impatience . [[My]742-i mother]2518-my mother says [he]92-henry is [the most delightful young man in [the world]191-the world]2519-the most delightful young man in the world ; [she]2518-my mother saw [him]92-henry this morning , [you]735-you know ; [you]735-you must introduce [him]92-henry to [me]742-i . Is [he]92-henry in [the house]211-the house now ? Look about , for heaven ’s sake ! [i]742-i assure [you]735-you , [I]742-i can hardly exist till [I]742-i see [him]92-henry . ”[742-i]

“ No , ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine , “ [he]92-henry is not [here]280-here ; [I]73-catherine can not see [him]92-henry anywhere . ”[73-catherine]

“ Oh , horrid ! am [I]742-i never to be acquainted with [him]92-henry ? How do [you]735-you like [my]742-i gown ? [I]742-i think it does not look amiss ; the sleeves were entirely [my]742-i own thought . Do [you]735-you know , [I]742-i get so immoderately sick of Bath ; [[your]735-you brother]2395-your brother and [I]742-i were agreeing this morning that , though it is vastly well to be [here]280-here for a few weeks , [we]2525-we would not live [here]280-here for millions . [We]2525-we soon found out that [our]2525-we tastes were exactly alike in preferring [the country]219-the country to [every other place]2528-every other place ; really , [our]2525-we opinions were so exactly the same , it was quite ridiculous ! there was not a single point in which [we]2525-we differed ; [I]742-i would not have had [you]735-you by for [the world]191-the world ; [you]735-you are such a sly thing , [I]742-i am sure [you]735-you would have made some droll remark or other about it . ”[742-i]

“ No , indeed [I]73-catherine should not . ”[73-catherine]

“ Oh , yes [you]735-you would indeed ; [I]742-i know [you]735-you better than [you]735-you know [yourself]735-you . [You]735-you would have told [us]2525-we that [we]2525-we seemed born for [each other]330-each other , or some nonsense of that kind , which would have distressed [me]742-i beyond conception ; [my]742-i cheeks would have been as red as [your]735-you roses ; [I]742-i would not have had [you]735-you by for [the world]191-the world . ”[742-i]

“ Indeed [you]735-you do [me]73-catherine injustice ; [I]73-catherine would not have made so improper a remark upon any account ; and besides , [I]73-catherine am sure it would never have entered [my]73-catherine head . ”[73-catherine]

[Isabella]101-isabella smiled incredulously and talked the rest of the evening to [James]103-james .

[Catherine]73-catherine ’s resolution of endeavouring to meet [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney again continued in full force the next morning ; and till the usual moment of going to [the pump - room]357-the pump - room , [she]101-isabella felt some alarm from the dread of a second prevention . But nothing of that kind occurred , [no visitors]744-no visitors appeared to delay [them]745-their , and [they]745-their all three set off in good time for [the pump - room]357-the pump - room , where the ordinary course of events and conversation took place ; [Mr. Allen]83-mr. allen , after drinking [his]83-mr. allen glass of water , joined [some gentlemen]747-some gentlemen to talk over the politics of the day and compare the accounts of [their]747-some gentlemen newspapers ; and [the ladies]312-the ladies walked about together , noticing every new face , and almost every new bonnet in [the room]301-the room . [The female part of [the Thorpe family]751-the thorpe family]750-the female part of the thorpe family , attended by [James Morland]103-james , appeared among [the crowd]298-the crowd in less than a quarter of an hour , and [Catherine]73-catherine immediately took [her]101-isabella usual place by the side of [[her]101-isabella friend]305-her friend . [James]103-james , who was now in constant attendance , maintained a similar position , and separating [themselves]745-their from the rest of [[their]745-their party]640-their party , [they]745-their walked in that manner for some time , till [Catherine]73-catherine began to doubt the happiness of a situation which , confining [her]101-isabella entirely to [[her]101-isabella friend]305-her friend and [brother]2366-brother , gave [her]101-isabella very little share in the notice of either . [They]745-their were always engaged in some sentimental discussion or lively dispute , but [their]745-their sentiment was conveyed in such whispering voices , and [their]745-their vivacity attended with so much laughter , that though [Catherine]73-catherine ’s supporting opinion was not unfrequently called for by one or [the other]412-the other , [she]101-isabella was never able to give any , from not having heard a word of the subject . At length however [she]101-isabella was empowered to disengage [herself]101-isabella from [[her]101-isabella friend]305-her friend , by the avowed necessity of speaking to [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney , whom [she]101-isabella most joyfully saw just entering [the room]301-the room with [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes , and whom [she]101-isabella instantly joined , with a firmer determination to be acquainted , than [she]101-isabella might have had courage to command , had [she]101-isabella not been urged by the disappointment of the day before . [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney met [her]101-isabella with great civility , returned [her]101-isabella advances with equal goodwill , and [they]745-their continued talking together as long as [both parties]760-both parties remained in [the room]301-the room ; and though in all probability not an observation was made , nor an expression used by either which had not been made and used some thousands of times before , under that roof , in every Bath season , yet the merit of [their]745-their being spoken with simplicity and truth , and without personal conceit , might be something uncommon .

“ How well [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother dances ! ”[125-mrs. hughes] was an artless exclamation of [Catherine]73-catherine ’s towards the close of [their]745-their conversation , which at once surprised and amused [[her]101-isabella companion]569-her companion .

“ [Henry]92-henry ! ”[101-isabella] [she]101-isabella replied with a smile . “ Yes , [he]2395-your brother does dance very well . ”[101-isabella]

“ [He]2395-your brother must have thought it very odd to hear [me]90-miss tilney say [I]90-miss tilney was engaged the other evening , when [he]2395-your brother saw [me]90-miss tilney sitting down . But [I]90-miss tilney really had been engaged the whole day to [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe . ”[90-miss tilney] [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney could only bow . “ [You]73-catherine can not think , ”[73-catherine] added [Catherine]73-catherine after a moment ’s silence , “ how surprised [I]73-catherine was to see [him]2395-your brother again . [I]73-catherine felt so sure of [his]2395-your brother being quite gone away . ”[73-catherine]

“ When [Henry]92-henry had the pleasure of seeing [you]73-catherine before , [he]2395-your brother was in [Bath]2236-bath but for a couple of days . [He]2395-your brother came only to engage lodgings for [us]2534-us . ”[90-miss tilney]

“ _ That _ never occurred to [me]73-catherine ; and of course , not seeing [him]2395-your brother anywhere , [I]73-catherine thought [he]2395-your brother must be gone . Was not [the young lady [he]2395-your brother danced with]2535-the young lady he danced with on Monday a [Miss Smith]131-miss smith ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Yes , [an acquaintance of [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes]2536-an acquaintance of mrs. hughes . ”[90-miss tilney]

“ [I]73-catherine dare say [she]2536-an acquaintance of mrs. hughes was very glad to dance . Do [you]73-catherine think [her]2536-an acquaintance of mrs. hughes pretty ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Not very . ”[90-miss tilney]

“ [He]2395-your brother never comes to [the pump - room]357-the pump - room , [I]73-catherine suppose ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Yes , sometimes ; but [he]2395-your brother has rid out this morning with [[my]90-miss tilney father]2538-my father . ”[90-miss tilney]

[Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes now joined [them]763-we , and asked [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney if [she]125-mrs. hughes was ready to go . “ [I]73-catherine hope [I]73-catherine shall have the pleasure of seeing [you]73-catherine again soon , ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine . “ Shall [you]73-catherine be at the cotillion ball to - morrow ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Perhaps [we]763-we — Yes , [I]90-miss tilney think [we]763-we certainly shall . ”[90-miss tilney]

“ [I]73-catherine am glad of it , for [we]763-we shall all be [there]2232-there . ”[73-catherine] This civility was duly returned ; and [they]763-we parted — on [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney ’s side with some knowledge of [[her]125-mrs. hughes new acquaintance]764-her new acquaintance ’s feelings , and on [Catherine]73-catherine ’s , without the smallest consciousness of having explained [them]763-we .

[She]125-mrs. hughes went [home]2403-home very happy . The morning had answered all [her]125-mrs. hughes hopes , and the evening of the following day was now the object of expectation , the future good . What gown and what head - dress [she]125-mrs. hughes should wear on the occasion became [her]125-mrs. hughes chief concern . [She]125-mrs. hughes can not be justified in it . Dress is at all times a frivolous distinction , and excessive solicitude about it often destroys its own aim . [Catherine]73-catherine knew all this very well ; [[her]125-mrs. hughes great aunt]766-her great aunt had read [her]125-mrs. hughes a lecture on the subject only the Christmas before ; and yet [she]125-mrs. hughes lay awake ten minutes on Wednesday night debating between [her]125-mrs. hughes spotted and [her]125-mrs. hughes tamboured muslin , and nothing but the shortness of the time prevented [her]125-mrs. hughes buying a new one for the evening . This would have been an error in judgment , great though not uncommon , from which one of the other sex rather than [her]125-mrs. hughes own , [a brother]767-a brother rather than [a great aunt]768-a great aunt , might have warned [her]125-mrs. hughes , for [man]769-man only can be aware of the insensibility of [man]769-man towards a new gown . It would be mortifying to the feelings of [many ladies]771-many ladies , could [they]771-many ladies be made to understand how little the heart of [man]769-man is affected by what is costly or new in [their]771-many ladies attire ; how little it is biased by the texture of [their]771-many ladies muslin , and how unsusceptible of peculiar tenderness towards the spotted , the sprigged , the mull , or the jackonet . [Woman]773-woman is fine for [her]773-woman own satisfaction alone . [No man]774-no man will admire [her]773-woman the more , [no woman]775-no woman will like [her]773-woman the better for it . Neatness and fashion are enough for the former , and a something of shabbiness or impropriety will be most endearing to [the latter]562-the latter . But not one of these grave reflections troubled the tranquillity of [Catherine]73-catherine .

[She]125-mrs. hughes entered [the rooms]2184-the rooms on Thursday evening with feelings very different from what had attended [her]125-mrs. hughes thither the Monday before . [She]125-mrs. hughes had then been exulting in [her]125-mrs. hughes engagement to [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe , and was now chiefly anxious to avoid [his]119-mr. thorpe sight , lest [he]119-mr. thorpe should engage [her]125-mrs. hughes again ; for though [she]125-mrs. hughes could not , dared not expect that [Mr. Tilney]92-henry should ask [her]125-mrs. hughes a third time to dance , [her]125-mrs. hughes wishes , hopes , and plans all centred in nothing less . [Every young lady]778-every young lady may feel for [[my]0-i heroine]779-my heroine in this critical moment , for [every young lady]778-every young lady has at some time or other known the same agitation . All have been , or at least all have believed [themselves]778-every young lady to be , in danger from the pursuit of [someone whom [they]778-every young lady wished to avoid]781-someone whom they wished to avoid ; and all have been anxious for the attentions of [someone whom [they]778-every young lady wished to please]782-someone whom they wished to please . As soon as [they]778-every young lady were joined by [the Thorpes]102-the thorpes , [Catherine]73-catherine ’s agony began ; [she]125-mrs. hughes fidgeted about if [John Thorpe]97-john came towards [her]125-mrs. hughes , hid [herself]125-mrs. hughes as much as possible from [his]97-john view , and when [he]97-john spoke to [her]125-mrs. hughes pretended not to hear [him]97-john . The cotillions were over , the country - dancing beginning , and [she]125-mrs. hughes saw nothing of [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys .

“ Do not be frightened , [[my]101-isabella dear]2185-my dear [Catherine]73-catherine , ”[101-isabella] whispered [Isabella]101-isabella , “ but [I]101-isabella am really going to dance with [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother again . [I]101-isabella declare positively it is quite shocking . [I]101-isabella tell [him]97-john [he]97-john ought to be ashamed of [himself]97-john , but [you]73-catherine and [John]97-john must keep [us]2542-us in countenance . Make haste , [[my]101-isabella dear creature]2394-my dear creature , and come to [us]2542-us . [John]97-john is just walked off , but [he]97-john will be back in a moment . ”[101-isabella]

[Catherine]73-catherine had neither time nor inclination to answer . [The others]2286-the others walked away , [John Thorpe]97-john was still in view , and [she]101-isabella gave [herself]101-isabella up for lost . That [she]101-isabella might not appear , however , to observe or expect [him]97-john , [she]101-isabella kept [her]101-isabella eyes intently fixed on [her]101-isabella fan ; and a self - condemnation for [her]101-isabella folly , in supposing that among [such a crowd]2202-such a crowd [they]785-they should even meet with [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys in any reasonable time , had just passed through [her]101-isabella mind , when [she]101-isabella suddenly found [herself]101-isabella addressed and again solicited to dance , by [Mr. Tilney]92-henry [himself]92-henry . With what sparkling eyes and ready motion [she]101-isabella granted [his]92-henry request , and with how pleasing a flutter of heart [she]101-isabella went with [him]92-henry to the set , may be easily imagined . To escape , and , as [she]101-isabella believed , so narrowly escape [John Thorpe]97-john , and to be asked , so immediately on [his]92-henry joining [her]101-isabella , asked by [Mr. Tilney]92-henry , as if [he]92-henry had sought [her]101-isabella on purpose!—it did not appear to [her]101-isabella that life could supply any greater felicity .

Scarcely had [they]785-they worked [themselves]785-they into the quiet possession of [a place]2401-a place , however , when [her]101-isabella attention was claimed by [John Thorpe]97-john , who stood behind [her]101-isabella . “ Heyday , [Miss Morland]84-miss morland ! ”[97-john] said [he]97-john . “ What is the meaning of this ? [I]97-john thought [you]101-isabella and [I]97-john were to dance together . ”[97-john]

“ [I]97-john wonder [you]101-isabella should think so , for [you]101-isabella never asked [me]97-john . ”[97-john]

“ That is a good one , by [Jove]133-jove ! [i]97-john asked [you]101-isabella as soon as [I]97-john came into [the room]301-the room , and [I]97-john was just going to ask [you]101-isabella again , but when [I]97-john turned round , [you]101-isabella were gone ! this is a cursed shabby trick ! [i]97-john only came for the sake of dancing with _ [you]101-isabella _ , and [I]97-john firmly believe [you]101-isabella were engaged to [me]97-john ever since Monday . Yes ; [I]97-john remember , [I]97-john asked [you]101-isabella while [you]101-isabella were waiting in [the lobby]2545-the lobby for [your]101-isabella cloak . And here have [I]97-john been telling all [my]97-john acquaintance that [I]97-john was going to dance with [the prettiest girl in [the room]301-the room]2546-the prettiest girl in the room ; and when [they]2548-they see [you]101-isabella standing up with [somebody else]2549-somebody else , [they]2548-they will quiz [me]97-john famously . ”[97-john]

“ Oh , no ; [they]2548-they will never think of _ [me]97-john _ , after such a description as that . ”[97-john]

“ By heavens , if [they]2548-they do not , [I]73-catherine will kick [them]2548-they out of [the room]301-the room for blockheads . What chap have [you]73-catherine there ? ”[73-catherine] [Catherine]73-catherine satisfied [his]73-catherine curiosity . “ [Tilney]92-henry , ”[73-catherine] [he]73-catherine repeated . “ [Hum]134-hum — [I]73-catherine do not know [him]92-henry . [A good figure of a man]2551-a good figure of a man ; well put together . Does [he]92-henry want a horse ? Here is [a friend of mine]2357-a friend of mine , [Sam Fletcher]135-sam fletcher , has got one to sell that would suit [anybody]192-anybody . A famous clever animal for [the road]2554-the road — only forty guineas . [I]73-catherine had fifty minds to buy it [myself]73-catherine , for it is one of [my]73-catherine maxims always to buy a good horse when [I]73-catherine meet with [one]2201-one ; but it would not answer [my]73-catherine purpose , it would not do for [the field]2556-the field . [I]73-catherine would give any money for [a real good hunter]2557-a real good hunter . [I]73-catherine have three now , the best that ever were backed . [I]73-catherine would not take eight hundred guineas for [them]2557-a real good hunter . [Fletcher]135-sam fletcher and [I]73-catherine mean to get [a house in [Leicestershire]30-leicestershire]2558-a house in leicestershire , against the next season . It is so d — — uncomfortable , living at [an inn]279-an inn . ”[73-catherine]

This was the last sentence by which [he]787-he could weary [Catherine]73-catherine ’s attention , for [he]787-he was just then borne off by the resistless pressure of a long string of [passing ladies]788-passing ladies . [[Her]789-i partner]389-her partner now drew near , and said , “ [That gentleman]644-that gentleman would have put [me]389-her partner out of patience , had [he]644-that gentleman stayed with [you]73-catherine half a minute longer . [He]644-that gentleman has no business to withdraw the attention of [[my]389-her partner partner]2511-my partner from [me]389-her partner . [We]2562-we have entered into a contract of mutual agreeableness for the space of an evening , and all [our]2562-we agreeableness belongs solely to [each other]330-each other for that time . [Nobody]2205-nobody can fasten [themselves]2205-nobody on the notice of one , without injuring the rights of [the other]412-the other . [I]389-her partner consider a country - dance as an emblem of marriage . Fidelity and complaisance are the principal duties of both ; and [those men who do not choose to dance or marry]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry [themselves]2205-nobody , have no business with [the partners or wives of [[their]2205-nobody neighbours]333-their neighbours]2567-the partners or wives of their neighbours . ”[389-her partner]

“ But [they]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry are such very different things ! ”[789-i]

“ — That [you]389-her partner think [they]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry can not be compared together . ”[389-her partner]

“ To be sure not . People that marry can never part , but must go and keep [house]2569-house together . [People that dance]2570-people that dance only stand opposite each other in [a long room]2571-a long room for half an hour . ”[789-i]

“ And such is [your]389-her partner definition of matrimony and dancing . Taken in that light certainly , [their]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry resemblance is not striking ; but [I]389-her partner think [I]389-her partner could place [them]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry in such a view . [You]389-her partner will allow , that in both , [man]769-man has the advantage of choice , [woman]773-woman only the power of refusal ; that in both , it is an engagement between [man]769-man and [woman]773-woman , formed for the advantage of each ; and that when once entered into , [they]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry belong exclusively to [each other]330-each other till the moment of its dissolution ; that it is [their]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry duty , each to endeavour to give [the other]412-the other no cause for wishing that [he]769-man or [she]2578-she had bestowed [themselves]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry elsewhere , and [their]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry best interest to keep [their]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry own imaginations from wandering towards the perfections of [[their]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry neighbours]333-their neighbours , or fancying that [they]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry should have been better off with [anyone else]2580-anyone else . [You]389-her partner will allow all this ? ”[389-her partner]

“ Yes , to be sure , as [you]389-her partner state it , all this sounds very well ; but still they are so very different . [I]789-i can not look upon [them]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry at all in the same light , nor think the same duties belong to [them]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry . ”[789-i]

“ In one respect , there certainly is a difference . In marriage , [the man]2581-the man is supposed to provide for the support of [the woman]2582-the woman , [the woman]2582-the woman to make [the home]2584-the home agreeable to [the man]2581-the man ; [he]2581-the man is to purvey , and [she]2582-the woman is to smile . But in dancing , [their]2566-those men who do not choose to dance or marry duties are exactly changed ; the agreeableness , the compliance are expected from [him]2581-the man , while [she]2582-the woman furnishes the fan and the lavender water . _ That _ , [I]389-her partner suppose , was the difference of duties which struck [you]389-her partner , as rendering the conditions incapable of comparison . ”[389-her partner]

“ No , indeed , [I]789-i never thought of that . ”[789-i]

“ Then [I]389-her partner am quite at a loss . One thing , however , [I]389-her partner must observe . This disposition on [your]389-her partner side is rather alarming . [You]389-her partner totally disallow any similarity in the obligations ; and may [I]389-her partner not thence infer that [your]389-her partner notions of the duties of the dancing state are not so strict as [[your]389-her partner partner]2276-your partner might wish ? Have [I]389-her partner not reason to fear that if [the gentleman who spoke to [you]389-her partner just now were to return , or if [any other gentleman]2588-any other gentleman were to address [you]389-her partner]2587-the gentleman who spoke to you just now were to return , or if any other gentleman were to address you , there would be nothing to restrain [you]389-her partner from conversing with [him]2581-the man as long as [you]389-her partner chose ? ”[389-her partner]

“ [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe is such [a very particular friend of [[my]789-i brother]2349-my brother ’s]2589-a very particular friend of my brother ’s , that if [he]119-mr. thorpe talks to [me]789-i , [I]789-i must talk to [him]119-mr. thorpe again ; but there are [hardly three young men in [the room]301-the room besides [him]119-mr. thorpe that [I]789-i have any acquaintance with]2591-hardly three young men in the room besides him that i have any acquaintance with . ”[789-i]

“ And is that to be [my]389-her partner only security ? Alas , alas ! ”[389-her partner]

“ Nay , [I]789-i am sure [you]389-her partner can not have a better ; for if [I]789-i do not know [anybody]192-anybody , it is impossible for [me]789-i to talk to [them]192-anybody ; and , besides , [I]789-i do not _ want _ to talk to [anybody]192-anybody . ”[789-i]

“ Now [you]389-her partner have given [me]389-her partner a security worth having ; and [I]389-her partner shall proceed with courage . Do [you]389-her partner find [Bath]5-bath as agreeable as when [I]389-her partner had the honour of making the inquiry before ? ”[389-her partner]

“ Yes , quite — more so , indeed . ”[789-i]

“ More so ! take care , or [you]389-her partner will forget to be tired of it at the proper time . [You]389-her partner ought to be tired at the end of six weeks . ”[389-her partner]

“ [I]789-i do not think [I]789-i should be tired , if [I]789-i were to stay [here]280-here six months . ”[789-i]

“ [Bath]5-bath , compared with [London]11-london , has little variety , and so [everybody]318-everybody finds out every year . ‘ For six weeks , [I]389-her partner allow [Bath]5-bath is pleasant enough ; but beyond _ that _ , [it]5-bath is [the most tiresome place in [the world]191-the world]2597-the most tiresome place in the world . ’ [You]389-her partner would be told so by [people of all descriptions , who come regularly every winter]2599-people of all descriptions , who come regularly every winter , lengthen [their]2599-people of all descriptions , who come regularly every winter six weeks into ten or twelve , and go away at last because [they]2599-people of all descriptions , who come regularly every winter can afford to stay no longer . ”[389-her partner]

“ Well , [other people]225-other people must judge for [themselves]225-other people , and [those who go to [London]11-london]2601-those who go to london may think nothing of [Bath]5-bath . But [I]789-i , who live in [a small retired village in [the country]219-the country]2602-a small retired village in the country , can never find greater sameness in such [a place as this]2604-a place as this than in [[my]789-i own home]2605-my own home ; for here are a variety of amusements , a variety of things to be seen and done all day long , which [I]789-i can know nothing of there . ”[789-i]

“ [You]789-i are not fond of [the country]219-the country . ”[389-her partner]

“ Yes , [I]789-i am . [I]789-i have always lived [there]2232-there , and always been very happy . But certainly there is much more sameness in [a country]2608-a country life than in a Bath life . One day in [the country]219-the country is exactly like another . ”[789-i]

“ But then [you]789-i spend [your]789-i time so much more rationally in [the country]219-the country . ”[389-her partner]

“ Do [I]789-i ? ”[789-i]

“ Do [you]789-i not ? ”[389-her partner]

“ [I]789-i do not believe there is much difference . ”[789-i]

“ Here [you]789-i are in pursuit only of amusement all day long . ”[389-her partner]

“ And so [I]789-i am at [home]2403-home — only [I]789-i do not find so much of it . [I]789-i walk about [here]280-here , and so [I]789-i do [there]2232-there ; but here [I]789-i see a variety of people in [every street]2614-every street , and [there]2232-there [I]789-i can only go and call on [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen . ”[789-i]

[Mr. Tilney]92-henry was very much amused .

“ Only go and call on [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ! ”[92-henry] [he]92-henry repeated . “ What a picture of intellectual poverty ! however , when [you]789-i sink into this abyss again , [you]789-i will have more to say . [You]789-i will be able to talk of Bath , and of all that [you]789-i did [here]280-here . ”[92-henry]

“ Oh ! yes . [I]789-i shall never be in want of something to talk of again to [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen , or anybody else . [I]789-i really believe [I]789-i shall always be talking of [Bath]5-bath , when [I]789-i am at [home]2403-home again — [I]789-i _ do _ like it so very much . If [I]789-i could but have [Papa]136-papa and [Mamma]137-mamma , and the rest of [them]2618-them here , [I]789-i suppose [I]789-i should be too happy ! [james]103-james ’s coming ( [[my]789-i eldest brother]2619-my eldest brother ) is quite delightful — and especially as it turns out that [the very family [we]2621-we are just got so intimate with]2620-the very family we are just got so intimate with are [[his]103-james intimate friends]2622-his intimate friends already . Oh ! who can ever be tired of [Bath]5-bath ? ”[789-i]

“ Not those who bring such fresh feelings of every sort to it as [you]2623-you do . But [papas]2624-papas and [mammas]2625-mammas , and [brothers]592-brothers , and [intimate friends]2627-intimate friends are a good deal gone by , to most of [the frequenters of [Bath]5-bath]2628-the frequenters of bath — and the honest relish of balls and plays , and everyday sights , is past with [them]2628-the frequenters of bath . ”[92-henry]

Here [their]791-their conversation closed , the demands of the dance becoming now too importunate for a divided attention .

Soon after [their]791-their reaching the bottom of the set , [Catherine]73-catherine perceived [herself]73-catherine to be earnestly regarded by [a gentleman who stood among [the lookers - on]793-the lookers - on , immediately behind [[her]794-her partner]389-her partner]792-a gentleman who stood among the lookers - on , immediately behind her partner . [He]792-a gentleman who stood among the lookers - on , immediately behind her partner was [a very handsome man , of a commanding aspect , past the bloom , but not past the vigour of life]796-a very handsome man , of a commanding aspect , past the bloom , but not past the vigour of life ; and with [his]792-a gentleman who stood among the lookers - on , immediately behind her partner eye still directed towards [her]794-her , [she]794-her saw [him]792-a gentleman who stood among the lookers - on , immediately behind her partner presently address [Mr. Tilney]92-henry in a familiar whisper . Confused by [his]792-a gentleman who stood among the lookers - on , immediately behind her partner notice , and blushing from the fear of its being excited by something wrong in [her]794-her appearance , [she]794-her turned away [her]794-her head . But while [she]794-her did so , [the gentleman]382-the gentleman retreated , and [[her]794-her partner]389-her partner , coming nearer , said , “ [I]382-the gentleman see that [you]73-catherine guess what [I]382-the gentleman have just been asked . [That gentleman]644-that gentleman knows [your]73-catherine name , and [you]73-catherine have a right to know [his]644-that gentleman . It is [General Tilney]138-general tilney , [[my]382-the gentleman father]2538-my father . ”[382-the gentleman]

[Catherine]73-catherine ’s answer was only “ Oh!”—but[73-catherine] it was an “ Oh ! ”[73-catherine] expressing everything needful : attention to [his]792-a gentleman who stood among the lookers - on , immediately behind her partner words , and perfect reliance on [their]799-their truth . With real interest and strong admiration did [her]794-her eye now follow [the General]800-the general , as [he]800-the general moved through [the crowd]298-the crowd , and “ How handsome [a family]2631-a family [they]802-the commonly frequented environs are ! ”[794-her] was [her]794-her secret remark .

In chatting with [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney before the evening concluded , a new source of felicity arose to [her]794-her . [She]794-her had never taken a country walk since [her]794-her arrival in [Bath]5-bath . [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney , to whom all [the commonly frequented environs]802-the commonly frequented environs were familiar , spoke of [them]802-the commonly frequented environs in terms which made [her]794-her all eagerness to know [them]802-the commonly frequented environs too ; and on [her]794-her openly fearing that [she]794-her might find [nobody]2205-nobody to go with [her]794-her , it was proposed by [the brother and sister]804-the brother and sister that [they]804-the brother and sister should join in a walk , some morning or other . “ [I]794-her shall like it , ”[794-her] [she]794-her cried , “ beyond anything in [the world]191-the world ; and do not let [us]804-the brother and sister put it off — let [us]804-the brother and sister go to - morrow . ”[794-her] This was readily agreed to , with only a proviso of [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney ’s , that it did not rain , which [Catherine]73-catherine was sure it would not . At twelve o’clock , [they]804-the brother and sister were to call for [her]794-her in [Pulteney Street]7-pulteney street ; and “ Remember — twelve o’clock , ”[804-the brother and sister] was [her]794-her parting speech to [[her]794-her new friend]434-her new friend . Of [her]794-her other , [her]794-her older , [[her]794-her more established friend]806-her more established friend , [Isabella]101-isabella , of whose fidelity and worth [she]794-her had enjoyed a fortnight ’s experience , [she]794-her scarcely saw anything during the evening . Yet , though longing to make [her]794-her acquainted with [her]794-her happiness , [she]794-her cheerfully submitted to the wish of [Mr. Allen]83-mr. allen , which took [them]804-the brother and sister rather early away , and [her]794-her spirits danced within [her]794-her , as [she]794-her danced in [her]794-her chair all the way [home]2403-home .

CHAPTER 11

The morrow brought a very sober - looking morning , the sun making only a few efforts to appear , and [Catherine]73-catherine augured from it everything most favourable to [her]794-her wishes . A bright morning so early in the year , [she]794-her allowed , would generally turn to rain , but a cloudy one foretold improvement as the day advanced . [She]794-her applied to [Mr. Allen]83-mr. allen for confirmation of [her]794-her hopes , but [Mr. Allen]83-mr. allen , not having [his]83-mr. allen own skies and barometer about [him]83-mr. allen , declined giving any absolute promise of sunshine . [She]794-her applied to [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen , and [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ’s opinion was more positive . “ [She]794-her had no doubt in [the world]191-the world of its being a very fine day , if the clouds would only go off , and the sun keep out . ”[86-mrs. allen]

At about eleven o’clock , however , a few specks of small rain upon the windows caught [Catherine]73-catherine ’s watchful eye , and “ Oh ! [dear]2320-dear , [I]794-her do believe it will be wet , ”[794-her] broke from [her]794-her in a most desponding tone .

“ [I]86-mrs. allen thought how it would be , ”[86-mrs. allen] said [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen .

“ No walk for [me]73-catherine to - day , ”[73-catherine] sighed [Catherine]73-catherine ; “ but perhaps it may come to nothing , or it may hold up before twelve . ”[73-catherine]

“ Perhaps it may , but then , [[my]86-mrs. allen dear]2185-my dear , it will be so dirty . ”[86-mrs. allen]

“ Oh ! that will not signify ; [I]73-catherine never mind dirt . ”[73-catherine]

“ No , ”[86-mrs. allen] replied [[her]794-her friend]305-her friend very placidly , “ [I]86-mrs. allen know [you]73-catherine never mind dirt . ”[86-mrs. allen]

After a short pause , “ It comes on faster and faster ! ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine , as [she]794-her stood watching at a window .

“ So it does indeed . If it keeps raining , [the streets]2636-the streets will be very wet . ”[73-catherine]

“ There are four umbrellas up already . How [I]73-catherine hate the sight of an umbrella ! ”[73-catherine]

“ They are disagreeable things to carry . [I]73-catherine would much rather take a chair at any time . ”[73-catherine]

“ It was such a nice - looking morning ! [i]73-catherine felt so convinced it would be dry ! ”[73-catherine]

“ [Anybody]192-anybody would have thought so indeed . There will be [very few people]2638-very few people in [the pump - room]357-the pump - room , if it rains all the morning . [I]73-catherine hope [Mr. Allen]83-mr. allen will put on [his]83-mr. allen greatcoat when [he]83-mr. allen goes , but [I]73-catherine dare say [he]83-mr. allen will not , for [he]83-mr. allen had rather do anything in [the world]191-the world than walk out in a greatcoat ; [I]73-catherine wonder [he]83-mr. allen should dislike it , it must be so comfortable . ”[73-catherine]

The rain continued — fast , though not heavy . [Catherine]73-catherine went every five minutes to the clock , threatening on each return that , if it still kept on raining another five minutes , [she]794-her would give up the matter as hopeless . The clock struck twelve , and it still rained . “ [You]73-catherine will not be able to go , [[my]73-catherine dear]2185-my dear . ”[73-catherine]

“ [I]73-catherine do not quite despair yet . [I]73-catherine shall not give it up till a quarter after twelve . This is just the time of day for it to clear up , and [I]73-catherine do think it looks a little lighter . There , it is twenty minutes after twelve , and now [I]73-catherine _ shall _ give it up entirely . Oh ! that [we]2642-we had such weather here as [they]2643-they had at [Udolpho]109-udolpho , or at least in [Tuscany]32-tuscany and [the south of [France!—the]33-france!—the]2644-the south of france!—the night that [poor St. Aubin]139-poor st. aubin died!—such beautiful weather ! ”[73-catherine]

At half past twelve , when [Catherine]73-catherine ’s anxious attention to the weather was over and [she]794-her could no longer claim any merit from its amendment , the sky began voluntarily to clear . A gleam of sunshine took [her]794-her quite by surprise ; [she]794-her looked round ; the clouds were parting , and [she]794-her instantly returned to the window to watch over and encourage the happy appearance . Ten minutes more made it certain that a bright afternoon would succeed , and justified the opinion of [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen [, who had “ always thought it would clear up . ”]2645-, who had “ always thought it would clear up . ”[2645-, who had “ always thought it would clear up . ”] But whether [Catherine]73-catherine might still expect [[her]794-her friends]809-her friends , whether there had not been too much rain for [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney to venture , must yet be a question .

It was too dirty for [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen to accompany [[her]794-her husband]810-her husband to [the pump - room]357-the pump - room ; [he]810-her husband accordingly set off by [himself]810-her husband , and [Catherine]73-catherine had barely watched [him]810-her husband down [the street]444-the street when [her]794-her notice was claimed by the approach of [the same two open carriages]813-the same two open carriages , containing [the same three people that had surprised [her]794-her so much a few mornings back]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back .

“ [Isabella]101-isabella , [[my]86-mrs. allen brother]2349-my brother , and [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe , [I]86-mrs. allen declare ! [they]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back are coming for [me]86-mrs. allen perhaps — but [I]86-mrs. allen shall not go — [I]86-mrs. allen can not go indeed , for [you]84-miss morland know [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney may still call . ”[86-mrs. allen] [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen agreed to it . [John Thorpe]97-john was soon with [them]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back , and [his]97-john voice was with [them]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back yet sooner , for on the stairs [he]97-john was calling out to [Miss Morland]84-miss morland to be quick . “ Make haste ! make haste ! ”[97-john] as [he]97-john threw open the door . “ Put on [your]84-miss morland hat this moment — there is no time to be lost — [we]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back are going to [Bristol]34-bristol . How d’ye do , [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ? ”[97-john]

“ To [Bristol]34-bristol ! is not that a great way off ? But , however , [I]97-john can not go with [you]84-miss morland to - day , because [I]97-john am engaged ; [I]97-john expect [some friends]2647-some friends every moment . ”[97-john] This was of course vehemently talked down as no reason at all ; [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen was called on to second [him]97-john , and [the two others]691-the two others walked in , to give [their]691-the two others assistance . “ [My]691-the two others sweetest [Catherine]73-catherine , is not this delightful ? [We]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back shall have a most heavenly drive . [You]73-catherine are to thank [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother and [me]691-the two others for the scheme ; it darted into [our]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back heads at breakfast - time , [I]691-the two others verily believe at the same instant ; and [we]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back should have been off two hours ago if it had not been for this detestable rain . But it does not signify , the nights are moonlight , and [we]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back shall do delightfully . Oh ! [i]691-the two others am in such ecstasies at the thoughts of a little country air and quiet ! so much better than going to [the Lower Rooms]362-the lower rooms . [We]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back shall drive directly to [Clifton]35-clifton and dine [there]2232-there ; and , as soon as dinner is over , if there is time for it , go on to [Kingsweston]36-kingsweston . ”[691-the two others]

“ [I]73-catherine doubt [our]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back being able to do so much , ”[73-catherine] said [Morland]73-catherine .

“ [[You]73-catherine croaking fellow]2651-you croaking fellow ! ”[119-mr. thorpe] cried [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe . “ [We]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back shall be able to do ten times more . [Kingsweston]36-kingsweston ! aye , and [Blaize Castle]37-blaize castle too , and anything else [we]814-the same three people that had surprised her so much a few mornings back can hear of ; but here is [[your]73-catherine sister]2261-your sister says [she]2261-your sister will not go . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ [Blaize Castle]37-blaize castle ! ”[73-catherine] cried [Catherine]73-catherine . “ What is that ? ”[73-catherine]

“ [The finest place in [England]2-england]2653-the finest place in england — worth going fifty miles at any time to see . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ What , is it really [a castle , an old castle]2654-a castle , an old castle ? ”[73-catherine]

“ [The oldest in [the kingdom]2656-the kingdom]2655-the oldest in the kingdom . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ But is it like what [one]2201-one reads of ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Exactly — the very same . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ But now really — are there towers and [long galleries]2658-long galleries ? ”[73-catherine]

“ By dozens . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Then [I]73-catherine should like to see it ; but [I]73-catherine cannot — [I]73-catherine can not go . ”[73-catherine]

“ Not go ! [my]119-mr. thorpe beloved creature , what do [you]119-mr. thorpe mean ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ [I]816-i can not go , because”—looking[816-i] down as [she]816-i spoke , fearful of [Isabella]101-isabella ’s smile—“I expect [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney and [[her]816-i brother]2287-her brother to call on [me]119-mr. thorpe to take a country walk . [They]2660-they promised to come at twelve , only it rained ; but now , as it is so fine , [I]119-mr. thorpe dare say [they]2660-they will be here soon . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Not [they]2660-they indeed , ”[119-mr. thorpe] cried [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe ; “ for , as [we]2661-we turned into [Broad Street]38-broad street , [I]119-mr. thorpe saw [them]2660-they — does [he]2287-her brother not drive a phaeton with bright chestnuts ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ [I]119-mr. thorpe do not know indeed . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Yes , [I]119-mr. thorpe know [he]2287-her brother does ; [I]119-mr. thorpe saw [him]2287-her brother . [You]119-mr. thorpe are talking of [the man [you]119-mr. thorpe danced with last night]2662-the man you danced with last night , are not [you]119-mr. thorpe ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Yes . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Did [you]119-mr. thorpe indeed ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ And well [they]2664-they might , for [I]119-mr. thorpe never saw so much dirt in [my]119-mr. thorpe life . Walk ! [You]119-mr. thorpe could no more walk than [you]119-mr. thorpe could fly ! [it]2665-it has not been so dirty the whole winter ; it is ankle - deep everywhere . ”[119-mr. thorpe]

[Isabella]101-isabella corroborated it : “ [[My]101-isabella dearest]2292-my dearest [Catherine]73-catherine , [you]73-catherine can not form an idea of the dirt ; come , [you]73-catherine must go ; [you]73-catherine can not refuse going now . ”[101-isabella]

“ [I]119-mr. thorpe should like to see [the castle]2667-the castle ; but may [we]2668-we go all over [it]2667-the castle ? May [we]2668-we go up [every staircase]2669-every staircase , and into [every suite of rooms]2670-every suite of rooms ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Yes , yes , every hole and corner . ”[101-isabella]

“ But then , if [they]2664-they should only be gone out for an hour till it is dryer , and call by and by ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Make [yourself]119-mr. thorpe easy , there is no danger of that , for [I]101-isabella heard [Tilney]90-miss tilney hallooing to [a man who was just passing by on horseback]2671-a man who was just passing by on horseback , that [they]2664-they were going as far as [Wick Rocks]40-wick rocks . ”[101-isabella]

“ Then [I]119-mr. thorpe will . Shall [I]119-mr. thorpe go , [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ? ”[119-mr. thorpe]

“ Just as [you]119-mr. thorpe please , [[my]101-isabella dear]2185-my dear . ”[101-isabella]

“ [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen , [you]86-mrs. allen must persuade [her]819-she to go , ”[119-mr. thorpe] was the general cry . [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen was not inattentive to it : “ Well , [[my]817-my dear]2185-my dear , ”[817-my] said [she]817-my , “ suppose [you]2185-my dear go . ”[817-my] And in two minutes [they]818-they were off .

[Catherine]73-catherine ’s feelings , as [she]819-she got into [the carriage]558-the carriage , were in a very unsettled state ; divided between regret for the loss of one great pleasure , and the hope of soon enjoying another , almost its equal in degree , however unlike in kind . [She]819-she could not think [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys had acted quite well by [her]819-she , in so readily giving up [their]132-the tilneys engagement , without sending [her]819-she any message of excuse . It was now but an hour later than the time fixed on for the beginning of [their]818-they walk ; and , in spite of what [she]819-she had heard of the prodigious accumulation of dirt in the course of that hour , [she]819-she could not from [her]819-she own observation help thinking that [they]132-the tilneys might have gone with very little inconvenience . To feel [herself]819-she slighted by [them]132-the tilneys was very painful . On the other hand , the delight of exploring [an edifice like [Udolpho]109-udolpho]821-an edifice like udolpho , as [her]819-she fancy represented [Blaize Castle]37-blaize castle to be , was such a counterpoise of good as might console [her]819-she for almost anything .

[They]818-they passed briskly down [Pulteney Street]7-pulteney street , and through [Laura Place]41-laura place , without the exchange of many words . [Thorpe]101-isabella talked to [his]822-his horse , and [she]819-she meditated , by turns , on broken promises and broken arches , phaetons and false hangings , [Tilneys]132-the tilneys and trap - doors . As [they]818-they entered [Argyle Buildings]42-argyle buildings , however , [she]819-she was roused by this address from [[her]819-she companion]569-her companion , “ Who is [that girl who looked at [you]101-isabella so hard as [she]2674-that girl who looked at you so hard as she went by went by]2674-that girl who looked at you so hard as she went by ? ”[569-her companion]

“ Who ? Where ? ”[569-her companion]

“ On [the right - hand pavement]2675-the right - hand pavement — [she]2674-that girl who looked at you so hard as she went by must be almost out of sight now . ”[569-her companion] [Catherine]73-catherine looked round and saw [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney leaning on [[her]819-she brother]2287-her brother ’s arm , walking slowly down [the street]444-the street . [She]819-she saw [them]818-they both looking back at [her]819-she . “ Stop , stop , [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe , ”[819-she] [she]819-she impatiently cried ; “ it is [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney ; it is indeed . How could [you]119-mr. thorpe tell [me]819-she [they]818-they were gone ? Stop , stop , [I]819-she will get out this moment and go to [them]818-they . ”[819-she] But to what purpose did [she]819-she speak ? [Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe only lashed [his]119-mr. thorpe horse into a brisker trot ; [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys , who had soon ceased to look after [her]819-she , were in a moment out of sight round [the corner of [Laura Place]41-laura place]826-the corner of laura place , and in another moment [she]819-she was [herself]819-she whisked into [the marketplace]827-the marketplace . Still , however , and during the length of [another street]828-another street , [she]819-she entreated [him]119-mr. thorpe to stop . “ Pray , pray stop , [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe . [I]819-she can not go on . [I]819-she will not go on .
