The whole walk was delightful , and though it ended too soon , its conclusion was delightful too ; [[her]1001-she friends]809-her friends attended [her]1001-she into [the house]211-the house , and [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney , before [they]809-her friends parted , addressing [herself]90-miss tilney with respectful form , as much to [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen as to [Catherine]73-catherine , petitioned for the pleasure of [her]1001-she company to dinner on the day after the next . No difficulty was made on [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ’s side , and the only difficulty on [Catherine]73-catherine ’s was in concealing the excess of [her]1001-she pleasure .

The morning had passed away so charmingly as to banish all [her]1001-she friendship and natural affection , for no thought of [Isabella]101-isabella or [James]103-james had crossed [her]1001-she during [their]809-her friends walk . When [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys were gone , [she]1001-she became amiable again , but [she]1001-she was amiable for some time to little effect ; [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen had no intelligence to give that could relieve [her]1001-she anxiety ; [she]1001-she had heard nothing of any of [them]809-her friends . Towards the end of the morning , however , [Catherine]73-catherine , having occasion for some indispensable yard of ribbon which must be bought without a moment ’s delay , walked out into [the town]356-the town , and in [Bond Street]54-bond street overtook the second [Miss Thorpe]95-miss thorpe as [she]1001-she was loitering towards [[Edgar]116-edgar ’s Buildings]2345-edgar ’s buildings between [two of [the sweetest girls in [the world]191-the world]1007-the sweetest girls in the world , who had been [[her]1001-she dear friends]1009-her dear friends all the morning]1006-two of the sweetest girls in the world , who had been her dear friends all the morning . From [her]1001-she , [she]1001-she soon learned that the party to [Clifton]35-clifton had taken place . “ [They]809-her friends set off at eight this morning , ”[155-anne] said [Miss Anne]155-anne , “ and [I]155-anne am sure [I]155-anne do not envy [them]809-her friends [their]809-her friends drive . [I]155-anne think [you]73-catherine and [I]155-anne are very well off to be out of the scrape . It must be the dullest thing in [the world]191-the world , for there is not a soul at [Clifton]35-clifton at this time of year . [Belle]101-isabella went with [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother , and [John]97-john drove [Maria]156-maria . ”[155-anne]

[Catherine]73-catherine spoke the pleasure [she]1001-she really felt on hearing this part of the arrangement .

“ Oh ! yes , ”[412-the other] rejoined [the other]412-the other , “ [Maria]156-maria is gone . [She]156-maria was quite wild to go . [She]156-maria thought it would be something very fine . [I]412-the other can not say [I]412-the other admire [her]156-maria taste ; and for [my]412-the other part , [I]412-the other was determined from the first not to go , if [they]2844-they pressed [me]412-the other ever so much . ”[412-the other]

[Catherine]73-catherine , a little doubtful of this , could not help answering , “ [I]73-catherine wish [you]412-the other could have gone too . It is a pity [you]412-the other could not all go . ”[73-catherine]

“ Thank [you]412-the other ; but it is quite a matter of indifference to [me]412-the other . Indeed , [I]412-the other would not have gone on any account . [I]412-the other was saying so to [Emily]145-emily and [Sophia]157-sophia when [you]412-the other overtook [us]2845-us . ”[412-the other]

[Catherine]73-catherine was still unconvinced ; but glad that [Anne]155-anne should have the friendship of [an Emily]1011-an emily and [a Sophia]157-sophia to console [her]155-anne , [she]155-anne bade [her]155-anne adieu without much uneasiness , and returned [home]2403-home , pleased that the party had not been prevented by [her]155-anne refusing to join it , and very heartily wishing that it might be too pleasant to allow either [James]103-james or [Isabella]101-isabella to resent [her]155-anne resistance any longer .

CHAPTER 15

Early the next day , a note from [Isabella]101-isabella , speaking peace and tenderness in every line , and entreating the immediate presence of [[her]101-isabella friend]305-her friend on a matter of the utmost importance , hastened [Catherine]73-catherine , in the happiest state of confidence and curiosity , to [[Edgar]116-edgar ’s Buildings]2345-edgar ’s buildings . [The two youngest Miss Thorpes]102-the thorpes were by [themselves]102-the thorpes in [the parlour]1015-the parlour ; and , on [Anne]155-anne ’s quitting it to call [[her]155-anne sister]269-her sister , [Catherine]73-catherine took the opportunity of asking [the other]412-the other for some particulars of [their]1018-their yesterday ’s party . [Maria]156-maria desired no greater pleasure than to speak of it ; and [Catherine]73-catherine immediately learnt that it had been altogether the most delightful scheme in [the world]191-the world , that [nobody]2205-nobody could imagine how charming it had been , and that it had been more delightful than [anybody]192-anybody could conceive . Such was the information of the first five minutes ; the second unfolded thus much in detail — that [they]1018-their had driven directly to [the York Hotel]1022-the york hotel , ate some soup , and bespoke an early dinner , walked down to [the pump - room]357-the pump - room , tasted the water , and laid out some shillings in purses and spars ; thence adjourned to eat ice at [a pastry - cook]1024-a pastry - cook ’s , and hurrying back to [the hotel]283-the hotel , swallowed [their]1018-their dinner in haste , to prevent being in the dark ; and then had a delightful drive back , only the moon was not up , and it rained a little , and [Mr. Morland]103-james ’s horse was so tired [he]103-james could hardly get it along .

[Catherine]73-catherine listened with heartfelt satisfaction . It appeared that [Blaize Castle]37-blaize castle had never been thought of ; and , as for all the rest , there was nothing to regret for half an instant . [Maria]156-maria ’s intelligence concluded with a tender effusion of pity for [[her]156-maria sister]269-her sister [Anne]155-anne , whom [she]156-maria represented as insupportably cross , from being excluded the party .

“ [She]156-maria will never forgive [me]156-maria , [I]156-maria am sure ; but , [you]73-catherine know , how could [I]156-maria help it ? [John]97-john would have [me]156-maria go , for [he]97-john vowed [he]97-john would not drive [her]156-maria , because [she]156-maria had such thick ankles . [I]156-maria dare say [she]156-maria will not be in good humour again this month ; but [I]156-maria am determined [I]156-maria will not be cross ; it is not a little matter that puts [me]156-maria out of temper . ”[156-maria]

[Isabella]101-isabella now entered [the room]301-the room with so eager a step , and a look of such happy importance , as engaged all [[her]101-isabella friend]305-her friend ’s notice . [Maria]156-maria was without ceremony sent away , and [Isabella]101-isabella , embracing [Catherine]73-catherine , thus began : “ Yes , [[my]101-isabella dear]2185-my dear [Catherine]73-catherine , it is so indeed ; [your]73-catherine penetration has not deceived [you]73-catherine . Oh , that arch eye of [yours]73-catherine ! it sees through everything . ”[101-isabella]

[Catherine]73-catherine replied only by a look of wondering ignorance .

“ Nay , [[my]412-the other beloved]2847-my beloved , [sweetest friend]2848-sweetest friend , ”[412-the other] continued [the other]412-the other , “ compose [yourself]73-catherine . [I]412-the other am amazingly agitated , as [you]73-catherine perceive . Let [us]2849-us sit down and talk in comfort . Well , and so [you]73-catherine guessed it the moment [you]73-catherine had [my]412-the other note ? [Sly creature]2850-sly creature ! oh ! [[my]412-the other dear]2185-my dear [Catherine]73-catherine , [you]73-catherine alone , who know [my]412-the other heart , can judge of [my]412-the other present happiness . [[Your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother is [the most charming of [men]2253-men]2853-the most charming of men . [I]412-the other only wish [I]412-the other were more worthy of [him]2395-your brother . But what will [[your]73-catherine excellent father]2855-your excellent father and [mother]183-mother say ? Oh ! heavens ! when [I]412-the other think of [them]2857-them [I]412-the other am so agitated ! ”[412-the other]

[Catherine]73-catherine ’s understanding began to awake : an idea of the truth suddenly darted into [her]1030-her mind ; and , with the natural blush of so new an emotion , [she]1030-her cried out , “ Good heaven ! [[my]1030-her dear]2185-my dear [Isabella]101-isabella , what do [you]101-isabella mean ? Can [you]101-isabella — can [you]101-isabella really be in love with [James]103-james ? ”[1030-her]

This bold surmise , however , [she]1030-her soon learnt comprehended but half the fact . The anxious affection , which [she]1030-her was accused of having continually watched in [Isabella]101-isabella ’s every look and action , had , in the course of [their]1031-their yesterday ’s party , received the delightful confession of an equal love . [Her]1030-her heart and faith were alike engaged to [James]103-james . Never had [Catherine]73-catherine listened to anything so full of interest , wonder , and joy . [[Her]1030-her brother]2287-her brother and [[her]1030-her friend]305-her friend engaged ! new to such circumstances , the importance of it appeared unspeakably great , and [she]1030-her contemplated it as one of those grand events , of which the ordinary course of life can hardly afford a return . The strength of [her]1030-her feelings [she]1030-her could not express ; the nature of them , however , contented [[her]1030-her friend]305-her friend . The happiness of having [such a sister]1035-such a sister was [their]1031-their first effusion , and [the fair ladies]1036-the fair ladies mingled in embraces and tears of joy .

Delighting , however , as [Catherine]73-catherine sincerely did , in the prospect of the connection , it must be acknowledged that [Isabella]101-isabella far surpassed [her]1030-her in tender anticipations . “ [You]73-catherine will be so infinitely dearer to [me]101-isabella , [[my]101-isabella [Catherine]73-catherine]2859-my catherine , than either [Anne]155-anne or [Maria]156-maria : [I]101-isabella feel that [I]101-isabella shall be so much more attached to [[my]101-isabella dear [Morland]73-catherine ’s family]2860-my dear morland ’s family than to [my]101-isabella own . ”[101-isabella]

This was a pitch of friendship beyond [Catherine]73-catherine .

“ [You]73-catherine are so like [[your]73-catherine dear brother]2861-your dear brother , ”[101-isabella] continued [Isabella]101-isabella , “ that [I]101-isabella quite doted on [you]73-catherine the first moment [I]101-isabella saw [you]73-catherine . But so it always is with [me]101-isabella ; the first moment settles everything . The very first day that [Morland]73-catherine came to [us]2862-us last Christmas — the very first moment [I]101-isabella beheld [him]73-catherine — [my]101-isabella heart was irrecoverably gone . [I]101-isabella remember [I]101-isabella wore [my]101-isabella yellow gown , with [my]101-isabella hair done up in braids ; and when [I]101-isabella came into [the drawing - room]445-the drawing - room , and [John]97-john introduced [him]2287-her brother , [I]101-isabella thought [I]101-isabella never saw [anybody so handsome]2864-anybody so handsome before . ”[101-isabella]

Here [Catherine]73-catherine secretly acknowledged the power of love ; for , though exceedingly fond of [[her]1037-i brother]2287-her brother , and partial to all [his]2287-her brother endowments , [she]1037-i had never in [her]1037-i life thought [him]2287-her brother handsome .

“ [I]1037-i remember too , [Miss Andrews]112-miss andrews drank tea with [us]2865-us that evening , and wore [her]112-miss andrews puce - coloured sarsenet ; and [she]112-miss andrews looked so heavenly that [I]1037-i thought [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother must certainly fall in love with [her]112-miss andrews ; [I]1037-i could not sleep a wink all night for thinking of it . Oh ! catherine , the many sleepless nights [I]1037-i have had on [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother ’s account ! [i]1037-i would not have [you]73-catherine suffer half what [I]1037-i have done ! [i]1037-i am grown wretchedly thin , [I]1037-i know ; but [I]1037-i will not pain [you]73-catherine by describing [my]1037-i anxiety ; [you]73-catherine have seen enough of it . [I]1037-i feel that [I]1037-i have betrayed [myself]1037-i perpetually — so unguarded in speaking of [my]1037-i partiality for [the church]2868-the church ! but [my]1037-i secret [I]1037-i was always sure would be safe with _ [you]73-catherine _ . ”[1037-i]

[Catherine]73-catherine felt that nothing could have been safer ; but ashamed of an ignorance little expected , [she]1039-she dared no longer contest the point , nor refuse to have been as full of arch penetration and affectionate sympathy as [Isabella]101-isabella chose to consider [her]1039-she . [[Her]1039-she brother]2287-her brother , [she]1039-she found , was preparing to set off with all speed to [Fullerton]3-fullerton , to make known [his]2287-her brother situation and ask consent ; and here was a source of some real agitation to the mind of [Isabella]101-isabella . [Catherine]73-catherine endeavoured to persuade [her]101-isabella , as [she]1039-she was [herself]1039-she persuaded , that [[her]1039-she father]182-her father and [mother]183-mother would never oppose [[their]1043-their son]1044-their son ’s wishes . “ It is impossible , ”[1039-she] said [she]1039-she , “ for [parents]2869-parents to be more kind , or more desirous of [[their]2869-parents children]2870-their children ’s happiness ; [I]1039-she have no doubt of [their]2870-their children consenting immediately . ”[1039-she]

“ [Morland]73-catherine says exactly the same , ”[101-isabella] replied [Isabella]101-isabella ; “ and yet [I]101-isabella dare not expect it ; [my]101-isabella fortune will be so small ; [they]2870-their children never can consent to it . [[Your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother , who might marry [anybody]192-anybody ! ”[101-isabella]

Here [Catherine]73-catherine again discerned the force of love .

“ Indeed , [Isabella]101-isabella , [you]101-isabella are too humble . The difference of fortune can be nothing to signify . ”[1039-she]

“ Oh ! This charming sentiment , recommended as much by sense as novelty , gave [Catherine]73-catherine a most pleasing remembrance of [all the heroines of [her]1046-i acquaintance]1045-all the heroines of her acquaintance ; and [she]1046-i thought [[her]1046-i friend]305-her friend never looked more lovely than in uttering the grand idea . “ [I]1046-i am sure [they]2879-they will consent , ”[1046-i] was [her]1046-i frequent declaration ; “ [I]1046-i am sure [they]2879-they will be delighted with [you]73-catherine . ”[1046-i]

“ For [my]101-isabella own part , ”[101-isabella] said [Isabella]101-isabella , “ [my]101-isabella wishes are so moderate that the smallest income in nature would be enough for [me]101-isabella . Where [people]320-people are really attached , poverty itself is wealth ; grandeur [I]101-isabella detest : [I]101-isabella would not settle in [London]11-london for [the universe]2881-the universe . [A cottage in [some retired village]2883-some retired village]2882-a cottage in some retired village would be ecstasy . “ [I]101-isabella am sure [I]101-isabella shall be miserable if [we]2885-we do not . If [I]101-isabella can but be near _ [you]73-catherine _ , [I]101-isabella shall be satisfied . A reverie succeeded this conviction — and when [Isabella]101-isabella spoke again , it was to resolve on the quality of [her]101-isabella wedding - gown .

[Their]1048-their conference was put an end to by [the anxious young lover [himself]1049-the anxious young lover himself , who came to breathe his parting sigh before he set off for wiltshire , who came to breathe [his]1049-the anxious young lover himself , who came to breathe his parting sigh before he set off for wiltshire parting sigh before [he]1049-the anxious young lover himself , who came to breathe his parting sigh before he set off for wiltshire set off for [Wiltshire]4-wiltshire]1049-the anxious young lover himself , who came to breathe his parting sigh before he set off for wiltshire . [Catherine]73-catherine wished to congratulate [him]1049-the anxious young lover himself , who came to breathe his parting sigh before he set off for wiltshire , but knew not what to say , and [her]101-isabella eloquence was only in [her]101-isabella eyes . From them , however , the eight parts of speech shone out most expressively , and [James]103-james could combine them with ease . Impatient for the realization of all that [he]103-james hoped at [home]2403-home , [his]103-james adieus were not long ; and they would have been yet shorter , had [he]103-james not been frequently detained by the urgent entreaties of [his]103-james fair one that [he]103-james would go . There , go , go — [I]103-james insist on it . ”[103-james]

[The two friends , with hearts now more united than ever]1051-the two friends , with hearts now more united than ever , were inseparable for the day ; and in schemes of sisterly happiness the hours flew along . [Mrs. Thorpe]96-mrs. thorpe and [[her]96-mrs. thorpe son]664-her son , who were acquainted with everything , and who seemed only to want [Mr. Morland]103-james ’s consent , to consider [Isabella]101-isabella ’s engagement as the most fortunate circumstance imaginable for [[their]1051-the two friends , with hearts now more united than ever family]1053-their family , were allowed to join [their]1051-the two friends , with hearts now more united than ever counsels , and add [their]1051-the two friends , with hearts now more united than ever quota of significant looks and mysterious expressions to fill up the measure of curiosity to be raised in [the unprivileged younger sisters]1054-the unprivileged younger sisters . To [Catherine]73-catherine ’s simple feelings , this odd sort of reserve seemed neither kindly meant , nor consistently supported ; and its unkindness [she]96-mrs. thorpe would hardly have forborne pointing out , had its inconsistency been less [[their]1051-the two friends , with hearts now more united than ever friend]1055-their friend ; but [Anne]155-anne and [Maria]156-maria soon set [her]96-mrs. thorpe heart at ease by the sagacity of [their]1051-the two friends , with hearts now more united than ever “ [I]96-mrs. thorpe know what ”[96-mrs. thorpe] ; and the evening was spent in a sort of war of wit , a display of family ingenuity , on one side in the mystery of an affected secret , on the other of undefined discovery , all equally acute .

[Catherine]73-catherine was with [[her]96-mrs. thorpe friend]305-her friend again the next day , endeavouring to support [her]96-mrs. thorpe spirits and while away the many tedious hours before the delivery of the letters ; a needful exertion , for as the time of reasonable expectation drew near , [Isabella]101-isabella became more and more desponding , and before the letter arrived , had worked [herself]101-isabella into a state of real distress . But when it did come , where could distress be found ? “ [I]101-isabella have had no difficulty in gaining the consent of [[my]101-isabella kind parents]2887-my kind parents , and am promised that everything in [their]2887-my kind parents power shall be done to forward [my]101-isabella happiness , ”[101-isabella] were the first three lines , and in one moment all was joyful security . The brightest glow was instantly spread over [Isabella]101-isabella ’s features , all care and anxiety seemed removed , [her]101-isabella spirits became almost too high for control , and [she]101-isabella called [herself]101-isabella without scruple [the happiest of mortals]1057-the happiest of mortals .

[Mrs. Thorpe]96-mrs. thorpe , with tears of joy , embraced [[her]96-mrs. thorpe daughter]266-her daughter , [[her]96-mrs. thorpe son]664-her son , [[her]96-mrs. thorpe visitor]1060-her visitor , and could have embraced [half the inhabitants of [Bath]5-bath]1061-half the inhabitants of bath with satisfaction . [Her]96-mrs. thorpe heart was overflowing with tenderness . It was “ dear [John]97-john ”[96-mrs. thorpe] and “ dear [Catherine]73-catherine ”[96-mrs. thorpe] at every word ; “ [dear Anne]155-anne and dear [Maria]156-maria ”[96-mrs. thorpe] must immediately be made [sharers]1062-sharers in [their]1062-sharers felicity ; and [two “ dears ”]2888-two “ dears ”[2888-two “ dears ”] at once before the name of [Isabella]101-isabella were not more than [that beloved child]1063-that beloved child had now well earned . [John]97-john [himself]97-john was [no skulker in joy]1064-no skulker in joy . [He]97-john not only bestowed on [Mr. Morland]103-james the high commendation of being [one of the finest fellows in [the world]191-the world]1065-one of the finest fellows in the world , but swore off many sentences in [his]97-john praise .

The letter , whence sprang all this felicity , was short , containing little more than this assurance of success ; and every particular was deferred till [James]103-james could write again . But for particulars [Isabella]101-isabella could well afford to wait . The needful was comprised in [Mr. Morland]103-james ’s promise ; [his]103-james honour was pledged to make everything easy ; and by what means [their]1067-their income was to be formed , whether [landed property]1068-landed property were to be resigned , or funded money made over , was a matter in which [her]101-isabella disinterested spirit took no concern . [She]101-isabella knew enough to feel secure of an honourable and speedy establishment , and [her]101-isabella imagination took a rapid flight over its attendant felicities . [She]101-isabella saw [herself]101-isabella at the end of a few weeks , the gaze and admiration of [every new acquaintance at [Fullerton]3-fullerton]1069-every new acquaintance at fullerton , the envy of [every valued old friend in [Putney]56-putney]1070-every valued old friend in putney , with [a carriage]683-a carriage at [her]101-isabella command , a new name on [her]101-isabella tickets , and a brilliant exhibition of hoop rings on [her]101-isabella finger .

When the contents of the letter were ascertained , [John Thorpe]97-john , who had only waited [its]1072-its arrival to begin [his]97-john journey to [London]11-london , prepared to set off . “ Well , [Miss Morland]84-miss morland , ”[97-john] said [he]97-john , on finding [her]101-isabella alone in [the parlour]1015-the parlour , “ [I]97-john am come to bid [you]101-isabella good - bye . ”[97-john] [Catherine]73-catherine wished [him]97-john a good journey . Without appearing to hear [her]101-isabella , [he]97-john walked to the window , fidgeted about , hummed a tune , and seemed wholly self - occupied .

“ Shall not [you]97-john be late at [Devizes]57-devizes ? ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine . [He]97-john made no answer ; but after a minute ’s silence burst out with , “ A famous good thing this marrying scheme , upon [my]97-john soul ! a clever fancy of [Morland]73-catherine ’s and [Belle]101-isabella ’s . “ [I]97-john am sure [I]97-john think it a very good one . ”[97-john]

“ Nay , but there is no such confounded hurry . Who knows when [we]2892-we may be together again ? Not but that [I]97-john shall be down again by the end of a fortnight , and a devilish long fortnight it will appear to [me]97-john . ”[97-john]

“ Then why do [you]1074-himself stay away so long ? ”[73-catherine] replied [Catherine]73-catherine — finding that [he]1074-himself waited for an answer .

“ That is kind of [you]84-miss morland , however — kind and good - natured . [I]97-john shall not forget it in a hurry . “ Oh ! dear , not at all . There are very few people [I]97-john am sorry to see . [Company]2898-company is always cheerful . ”[97-john]

“ That is just [my]97-john way of thinking . Give [me]97-john but a little cheerful company , let [me]97-john only have the company of [the people [I]97-john love]2899-the people i love , let [me]97-john only be where [I]97-john like and with whom [I]97-john like , and [the devil take the rest]2900-the devil take the rest , say [I.]97-john And [I]97-john am heartily glad to hear [you]84-miss morland say the same . “ Perhaps [we]2901-we may ; but it is more than [I]97-john ever thought of . And as to _ most matters _ , to say the truth , there are not many that [I]97-john know [my]97-john own mind about . ”[97-john]

“ By [Jove]133-jove , no more do [I.]97-john It is not [my]97-john way to bother [my]97-john brains with what does not concern [me]97-john . [My]97-john notion of things is simple enough . Let [me]97-john only have [the girl]2902-the girl [I]97-john like , say [I]97-john , with [a comfortable house over [my]97-john head]2903-a comfortable house over my head , and what care [I]97-john for all the rest ? “ Very true . [I]97-john think like [you]1075-her there . If there is a good fortune on one side , there can be no occasion for any on the other . No matter which has it , so that there is enough . [I]97-john hate the idea of one great fortune looking out for another . And to marry for money [I]97-john think the wickedest thing in existence . Good day . [We]2904-we shall be very glad to see [you]1075-her at [Fullerton]3-fullerton , whenever it is convenient . ”[97-john] And away [she]1075-her went . It was not in the power of all [his]1076-his gallantry to detain [her]1075-her longer . With such news to communicate , and such a visit to prepare for , [her]1075-her departure was not to be delayed by anything in [his]1076-his nature to urge ; and [she]1075-her hurried away , leaving [him]1076-his to the undivided consciousness of [his]1076-his own happy address , and [her]1075-her explicit encouragement .

The agitation which [she]1075-her had [herself]1075-her experienced on first learning [[her]1075-her brother]2287-her brother ’s engagement made [her]1075-her expect to raise no inconsiderable emotion in [Mr.]1078-mr. and [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen , by the communication of the wonderful event . How great was [her]1075-her disappointment ! the important affair , which many words of preparation ushered in , had been foreseen by [them]1079-them both ever since [[her]1075-her brother]2287-her brother ’s arrival ; and all that [they]1079-them felt on the occasion was comprehended in a wish for [the young people]1081-the young people ’s happiness , with a remark , on [the gentleman]382-the gentleman ’s side , in favour of [Isabella]101-isabella ’s beauty , and on [the lady]378-the lady ’s , of [her]1075-her great good luck . It was to [Catherine]73-catherine the most surprising insensibility . The disclosure , however , of the great secret of [James]103-james ’s going to [Fullerton]3-fullerton the day before , did raise some emotion in [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen . [She]1075-her could not listen to that with perfect calmness , but repeatedly regretted the necessity of its concealment , wished [she]1075-her could have known [his]2287-her brother intention , wished [she]1075-her could have seen [him]2287-her brother before [he]2287-her brother went , as [she]1075-her should certainly have troubled [him]2287-her brother with [her]1075-her best regards to [[his]2287-her brother father]881-his father and [mother]183-mother , and [her]1075-her kind compliments to [all the Skinners]1086-all the skinners .

CHAPTER 16

[Catherine]73-catherine ’s expectations of pleasure from [her]1075-her visit in [Milsom Street]14-milsom street were so very high that disappointment was inevitable ; and accordingly , though [she]1075-her was most politely received by [General Tilney]138-general tilney , and kindly welcomed by [[his]138-general tilney daughter]2509-his daughter , though [Henry]92-henry was at [home]2403-home , and [no one else of the party]1089-no one else of the party , [she]1075-her found , on [her]1075-her return , without spending many hours in the examination of [her]1075-her feelings , that [she]1075-her had gone to [her]1075-her appointment preparing for happiness which it had not afforded . Instead of finding [herself]1075-her improved in acquaintance with [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney , from the intercourse of the day , [she]1075-her seemed hardly so intimate with [her]1075-her as before ; instead of seeing [Henry Tilney]92-henry to greater advantage than ever , in the ease of a family party , [he]92-henry had never said so little , nor been so little agreeable ; and , in spite of [[their]1090-their father]1091-their father ’s great civilities to [her]1075-her — in spite of [his]92-henry thanks , invitations , and compliments — it had been a release to get away from [him]92-henry . It puzzled [her]1075-her to account for all this . It could not be [General Tilney]138-general tilney ’s fault . That [he]92-henry was perfectly agreeable and good - natured , and altogether [a very charming man]1092-a very charming man , did not admit of a doubt , for [he]92-henry was tall and handsome , and [[Henry]92-henry ’s father]1093-henry ’s father . _ [He]92-henry _ could not be accountable for [[his]92-henry children]1094-his children ’s want of spirits , or for [her]1075-her want of enjoyment in [his]92-henry company . The former [she]1075-her hoped at last might have been accidental , and the latter [she]1075-her could only attribute to [her]1075-her own stupidity . [Isabella]101-isabella , on hearing the particulars of the visit , gave a different explanation : “ It was all pride , pride , insufferable haughtiness and pride ! [she]1075-her had long suspected [the family]454-the family to be very high , and this made it certain . Such insolence of behaviour as [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney ’s [she]1075-her had never heard of in [her]1075-her life ! not to do the honours of [[her]1075-her house]2906-her house with common good breeding ! to behave to [[her]1075-her guest]2907-her guest with such superciliousness ! hardly even to speak to [her]1075-her ! ”[101-isabella]

“ But it was not so bad as that , [Isabella]101-isabella ; there was no superciliousness ; [she]1075-her was very civil . ”[101-isabella]

“ Oh , do n’t defend [her]1075-her ! and then [the brother]2908-the brother , [he]2908-the brother , who had appeared so attached to [you]101-isabella ! good heavens ! well , [some people]2362-some people ’s feelings are incomprehensible . And so [he]2908-the brother hardly looked once at [you]101-isabella the whole day ? ”[101-isabella]

“ [I]101-isabella do not say so ; but [he]2908-the brother did not seem in good spirits . ”[101-isabella]

“ How contemptible ! of all things in [the world]191-the world inconstancy is [my]101-isabella aversion . Let [me]101-isabella entreat [you]101-isabella never to think of [him]2908-the brother again , [[my]101-isabella dear]2185-my dear [Catherine]73-catherine ; indeed [he]2908-the brother is unworthy of [you]101-isabella . ”[101-isabella]

“ Unworthy ! [i]101-isabella do not suppose [he]2908-the brother ever thinks of [me]101-isabella . ”[101-isabella]

“ That is exactly what [I]101-isabella say ; [he]2908-the brother never thinks of [you]101-isabella . Such fickleness ! Oh ! how different to [[your]101-isabella brother]2395-your brother and to [mine]101-isabella ! [i]101-isabella really believe [John]97-john has the most constant heart . ”[101-isabella]

“ But as for [General Tilney]138-general tilney , [I]101-isabella assure [you]101-isabella it would be impossible for [anybody]192-anybody to behave to [me]101-isabella with greater civility and attention ; it seemed to be [his]2908-the brother only care to entertain and make [me]101-isabella happy . ”[101-isabella]

“ Oh ! [i]101-isabella know no harm of [him]2908-the brother ; [I]101-isabella do not suspect [him]2908-the brother of pride . [I]101-isabella believe [he]2908-the brother is [a very gentleman - like man]2914-a very gentleman - like man . [John]97-john thinks very well of [him]2908-the brother , and [John]97-john ’s judgment — ”[101-isabella]

“ Well , [I]101-isabella shall see how [they]2915-they behave to [me]101-isabella this evening ; [we]2916-we shall meet [them]2915-they at [the rooms]2184-the rooms . ”[101-isabella]

“ And must [I]101-isabella go ? ”[101-isabella]

“ Do not [you]101-isabella intend it ? [I]101-isabella thought it was all settled . ”[101-isabella]

“ Nay , since [you]101-isabella make such a point of it , [I]101-isabella can refuse [you]101-isabella nothing . But do not insist upon [my]101-isabella being very agreeable , for [my]101-isabella heart , [you]101-isabella know , will be some forty miles off . And as for dancing , do not mention it , [I]101-isabella beg ; _ that _ is quite out of the question . [Charles Hodges]158-charles hodges will plague [me]101-isabella to death , [I]101-isabella dare say ; but [I]101-isabella shall cut [him]158-charles hodges very short . Ten to one but [he]158-charles hodges guesses the reason , and that is exactly what [I]101-isabella want to avoid , so [I]101-isabella shall insist on [his]158-charles hodges keeping [his]158-charles hodges conjecture to [himself]158-charles hodges . ”[101-isabella]

[Isabella]101-isabella ’s opinion of [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys did not influence [[her]101-isabella friend]305-her friend ; [she]101-isabella was sure there had been no insolence in the manners either of [brother]2366-brother or [sister]737-sister ; and [she]101-isabella did not credit there being any pride in [their]132-the tilneys hearts . The evening rewarded [her]101-isabella confidence ; [she]101-isabella was met by [one with the same kindness]1098-one with the same kindness , and by [the other]412-the other with the same attention , as heretofore : [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney took pains to be near [her]101-isabella , and [Henry]92-henry asked [her]101-isabella to dance .

Having heard the day before in [Milsom Street]14-milsom street that [[their]132-the tilneys elder brother]1100-their elder brother , [Captain Tilney]74-captain tilney , was expected almost every hour , [she]101-isabella was at no loss for the name of [a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom [she]101-isabella had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to [their]132-the tilneys party]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party . [She]101-isabella looked at [him]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party with great admiration , and even supposed it possible that [some people]2362-some people might think [him]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party handsomer than [[his]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party brother]1103-his brother , though , in [her]101-isabella eyes , [his]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party air was more assuming , and [his]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party countenance less prepossessing . [His]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party taste and manners were beyond a doubt decidedly inferior ; for , within [her]101-isabella hearing , [he]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party not only protested against every thought of dancing [himself]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party , but even laughed openly at [Henry]92-henry for finding it possible . From the latter circumstance it may be presumed that , whatever might be [[our]1104-our heroine]294-our heroine ’s opinion of [him]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party , [his]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party admiration of [her]101-isabella was not of a very dangerous kind ; not likely to produce animosities between [the brothers]1106-the brothers , nor persecutions to [the lady]378-the lady . _ [He]1101-a very fashionable - looking , handsome young man , whom she had never seen before , and who now evidently belonged to their party _ can not be [the instigator of the three villains in [horsemen]534-horsemen ’s greatcoats , by whom [she]101-isabella will hereafter be forced into [a traveling - chaise and four]1110-a traveling - chaise and four , which will drive off with incredible speed]1108-the instigator of the three villains in horsemen ’s greatcoats , by whom she will hereafter be forced into a traveling - chaise and four , which will drive off with incredible speed . [Catherine]73-catherine , meanwhile , undisturbed by presentiments of such an evil , or of any evil at all , except that of having but a short set to dance down , enjoyed [her]101-isabella usual happiness with [Henry Tilney]92-henry , listening with sparkling eyes to everything [he]92-henry said ; and , in finding [him]92-henry irresistible , becoming so [herself]101-isabella .

At the end of the first dance , [Captain Tilney]74-captain tilney came towards [them]1111-them again , and , much to [Catherine]73-catherine ’s dissatisfaction , pulled [[his]74-captain tilney brother]1103-his brother away . [They]1111-them retired whispering together ; and , though [her]101-isabella delicate sensibility did not take immediate alarm , and lay it down as fact , that [Captain Tilney]74-captain tilney must have heard some malevolent misrepresentation of [her]101-isabella , which [he]74-captain tilney now hastened to communicate to [[his]74-captain tilney brother]1103-his brother , in the hope of separating [them]1111-them forever , [she]101-isabella could not have [[her]101-isabella partner]389-her partner conveyed from [her]101-isabella sight without very uneasy sensations . [Her]101-isabella suspense was of full five minutes ’ duration ; and [she]101-isabella was beginning to think it a very long quarter of an hour , when [they]1111-them both returned , and an explanation was given , by [Henry]92-henry ’s requesting to know , if [she]101-isabella thought [[her]101-isabella friend]305-her friend , [Miss Thorpe]95-miss thorpe , would have any objection to dancing , as [[his]74-captain tilney brother]1103-his brother would be most happy to be introduced to [her]101-isabella . [Catherine]73-catherine , without hesitation , replied that [she]101-isabella was very sure [Miss Thorpe]95-miss thorpe did not mean to dance at all . The cruel reply was passed on to [the other]412-the other , and [he]1103-his brother immediately walked away .

“ [[Your]92-henry brother]2395-your brother will not mind it , [I]101-isabella know , ”[101-isabella] said [she]101-isabella , “ because [I]101-isabella heard [him]2395-your brother say before that [he]2395-your brother hated dancing ; but it was very good - natured in [him]2395-your brother to think of it . [I]101-isabella suppose [he]2395-your brother saw [Isabella]101-isabella sitting down , and fancied [she]101-isabella might wish for [a partner]2186-a partner ; but [he]2395-your brother is quite mistaken , for [she]101-isabella would not dance upon any account in [the world]191-the world . ”[101-isabella]

[Henry]92-henry smiled , and said , “ How very little trouble it can give [you]101-isabella to understand the motive of [other people]225-other people ’s actions . ”[92-henry]

“ Why ? What do [you]92-henry mean ? ”[92-henry]

“ With [you]101-isabella , it is not , How is [such a one]2922-such a one likely to be influenced , What is the inducement most likely to act upon [such a person]2923-such a person ’s feelings , age , situation , and probable habits of life considered — but , How should _ [I]92-henry _ be influenced , What would be _ [my]92-henry _ inducement in acting so and so ? ”[92-henry]

“ [I]92-henry do not understand [you]101-isabella . ”[92-henry]

“ Then [we]2924-we are on very unequal terms , for [I]92-henry understand [you]101-isabella perfectly well . ”[92-henry]

“ [Me]92-henry ? Yes ; [I]92-henry can not speak well enough to be unintelligible . ”[92-henry]

“ Bravo ! an excellent satire on modern language . ”[92-henry]

“ But pray tell [me]92-henry what [you]101-isabella mean . ”[92-henry]

“ Shall [I]92-henry indeed ? Do [you]101-isabella really desire it ? But [you]101-isabella are not aware of the consequences ; it will involve [you]101-isabella in a very cruel embarrassment , and certainly bring on a disagreement between [us]2924-we . ”[92-henry]

“ No , no ; it shall not do either ; [I]92-henry am not afraid . ”[92-henry]

“ Well , then , [I]92-henry only meant that [your]101-isabella attributing [[my]92-henry brother]2349-my brother ’s wish of dancing with [Miss Thorpe]95-miss thorpe to good nature alone convinced [me]92-henry of [your]101-isabella being superior in good nature [yourself]101-isabella to [all the rest of [the world]191-the world]2926-all the rest of the world . ”[92-henry]

[Catherine]73-catherine blushed and disclaimed , and [the gentleman]382-the gentleman ’s predictions were verified . There was a something , however , in [his]382-the gentleman words which repaid [her]1119-i for the pain of confusion ; and that something occupied [her]1119-i mind so much that [she]1119-i drew back for some time , forgetting to speak or to listen , and almost forgetting where [she]1119-i was ; till , roused by the voice of [Isabella]101-isabella , [she]1119-i looked up and saw [her]101-isabella with [Captain Tilney]74-captain tilney preparing to give [them]1120-them hands across .

[Isabella]101-isabella shrugged [her]101-isabella shoulders and smiled , the only explanation of this extraordinary change which could at that time be given ; but as it was not quite enough for [Catherine]73-catherine ’s comprehension , [she]1119-i spoke [her]1119-i astonishment in very plain terms to [[her]1119-i partner]389-her partner .

“ [I]1119-i can not think how it could happen ! [isabella]101-isabella was so determined not to dance . ”[1119-i]

“ And did [Isabella]101-isabella never change [her]101-isabella mind before ? ”[1119-i]

“ Oh ! but , because — And [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother ! after what [you]73-catherine told [him]2395-your brother from [me]1119-i , how could [he]2395-your brother think of going to ask [her]101-isabella ? ”[1119-i]

“ [I]1119-i can not take surprise to [myself]1119-i on that head . [You]73-catherine bid [me]1119-i be surprised on [[your]73-catherine friend]2772-your friend ’s account , and therefore [I]1119-i am ; but as for [[my]1119-i brother]2349-my brother , [his]2395-your brother conduct in the business , [I]1119-i must own , has been no more than [I]1119-i believed [him]2395-your brother perfectly equal to . The fairness of [[your]73-catherine friend]2772-your friend was an open attraction ; [her]2772-your friend firmness , [you]73-catherine know , could only be understood by [yourself]73-catherine . ”[1119-i]

“ [You]73-catherine are laughing ; but , [I]1119-i assure [you]73-catherine , [Isabella]101-isabella is very firm in general . ”[1119-i]

“ It is as much as should be said of [anyone]2932-anyone . To be always firm must be to be often obstinate . When properly to relax is the trial of judgment ; and , without reference to [[my]1119-i brother]2349-my brother , [I]1119-i really think [Miss Thorpe]95-miss thorpe has by no means chosen ill in fixing on the present hour . ”[1119-i]

[The friends]1122-the friends were not able to get together for any confidential discourse till all the dancing was over ; but then , as [they]1122-the friends walked about [the room]301-the room arm in arm , [Isabella]101-isabella thus explained [herself]101-isabella : “ [I]101-isabella do not wonder at [your]73-catherine surprise ; and [I]101-isabella am really fatigued to death . [He]2349-my brother is such a rattle ! amusing enough , if [my]101-isabella mind had been disengaged ; but [I]101-isabella would have given [the world]191-the world to sit still . ”[101-isabella]

“ Then why did not [you]101-isabella ? ”[1119-i]

“ Oh ! [[my]101-isabella dear]2185-my dear ! it would have looked so particular ; and [you]73-catherine know how [I]101-isabella abhor doing that . [I]101-isabella refused [him]2349-my brother as long as [I]101-isabella possibly could , but [he]2349-my brother would take no denial . [You]73-catherine have no idea how [he]2349-my brother pressed [me]101-isabella . [I]101-isabella begged [him]2349-my brother to excuse [me]101-isabella , and get [some other partner]2936-some other partner — but no , not [he]2349-my brother ; after aspiring to [my]101-isabella hand , there was [nobody else]2937-nobody else in [the room]301-the room [he]2349-my brother could bear to think of ; and it was not that [he]2349-my brother wanted merely to dance , [he]2349-my brother wanted to be with [me]101-isabella . Oh ! such nonsense ! [i]101-isabella told [him]2349-my brother [he]2349-my brother had taken a very unlikely way to prevail upon [me]101-isabella ; for , of all things in [the world]191-the world , [I]101-isabella hated fine speeches and compliments ; and so — and so then [I]101-isabella found there would be no peace if [I]101-isabella did not stand up . Besides , [I]101-isabella thought [Mrs. Hughes]125-mrs. hughes , who introduced [him]2349-my brother , might take it ill if [I]101-isabella did not : and [[your]2940-your dear brother]2861-your dear brother , [I]101-isabella am sure [he]2349-my brother would have been miserable if [I]101-isabella had sat down the whole evening . [I]101-isabella am so glad it is over ! [my]101-isabella spirits are quite jaded with listening to [his]2349-my brother nonsense : and then , being such [a smart young fellow]2942-a smart young fellow , [I]101-isabella saw every eye was upon [us]2943-us . ”[101-isabella]

“ [He]2349-my brother is very handsome indeed . ”[1119-i]

“ Handsome ! yes , [I]101-isabella suppose [he]2349-my brother may . [I]101-isabella dare say [people]320-people would admire [him]2349-my brother in general ; but [he]2349-my brother is not at all in [my]101-isabella style of beauty . [I]101-isabella hate a florid complexion and dark eyes in [a man]2335-a man . However , [he]2349-my brother is very well . Amazingly conceited , [I]101-isabella am sure . [I]101-isabella took [him]2349-my brother down several times , [you]2946-you know , in [my]101-isabella way . ”[101-isabella]

When [the young ladies]559-the young ladies next met , [they]559-the young ladies had a far more interesting subject to discuss . [James Morland]103-james ’s second letter was then received , and the kind intentions of [[his]103-james father]881-his father fully explained . A living , of which [Mr. Morland]103-james was [himself]103-james [patron and incumbent]1126-patron and incumbent , of about four hundred pounds yearly value , was to be resigned to [[his]103-james son]2708-his son as soon as [he]103-james should be old enough to take it ; no trifling deduction from the family income , no niggardly assignment to [one of [ten children]1129-ten children]1128-one of ten children . An estate of at least equal value , moreover , was assured as [his]103-james future inheritance .

[James]103-james expressed [himself]103-james on the occasion with becoming gratitude ; and the necessity of waiting between two and three years before [they]559-the young ladies could marry , being , however unwelcome , no more than [he]103-james had expected , was borne by [him]103-james without discontent . [Catherine]73-catherine , whose expectations had been as unfixed as [her]1130-her ideas of [[her]1130-her father]182-her father ’s income , and whose judgment was now entirely led by [[her]1130-her brother]2287-her brother , felt equally well satisfied , and heartily congratulated [Isabella]101-isabella on having everything so pleasantly settled .

“ It is very charming indeed , ”[101-isabella] said [Isabella]101-isabella , with a grave face . “ [Mr. Morland]103-james has behaved vastly handsome indeed , ”[96-mrs. thorpe] said [the gentle Mrs. Thorpe]96-mrs. thorpe , looking anxiously at [[her]96-mrs. thorpe daughter]266-her daughter . “ [I]96-mrs. thorpe only wish [I]96-mrs. thorpe could do as much . [One]2201-one could not expect more from [him]103-james , [you]266-her daughter know . If [he]103-james finds [he]103-james _ can _ do more by and by , [I]96-mrs. thorpe dare say [he]103-james will , for [I]96-mrs. thorpe am sure [he]103-james must be [an excellent good - hearted man]2948-an excellent good - hearted man . Four hundred is but a small income to begin on indeed , but [your]266-her daughter wishes , [[my]96-mrs. thorpe dear]2185-my dear [Isabella]101-isabella , are so moderate , [you]266-her daughter do not consider how little [you]266-her daughter ever want , [[my]96-mrs. thorpe dear]2185-my dear . ”[96-mrs. thorpe]

“ It is not on [my]96-mrs. thorpe own account [I]96-mrs. thorpe wish for more ; but [I]96-mrs. thorpe can not bear to be the means of injuring [[my]96-mrs. thorpe dear]2185-my dear [Morland]103-james , making [him]103-james sit down upon an income hardly enough to find one in the common necessaries of life . For [myself]96-mrs. thorpe , it is nothing ; [I]96-mrs. thorpe never think of [myself]96-mrs. thorpe . ”[96-mrs. thorpe]

“ [I]96-mrs. thorpe know [you]266-her daughter never do , [[my]96-mrs. thorpe dear]2185-my dear ; and [you]266-her daughter will always find [your]266-her daughter reward in the affection it makes [everybody]318-everybody feel for [you]266-her daughter . There never was [a young woman so beloved as [you]266-her daughter are by [everybody that knows [you]266-her daughter]2955-everybody that knows you]2954-a young woman so beloved as you are by everybody that knows you ; and [I]96-mrs. thorpe dare say when [Mr. Morland]103-james sees [you]266-her daughter , [[my]96-mrs. thorpe dear child]2956-my dear child — but do not let [us]2957-us distress [[our]2957-us dear]2958-our dear [Catherine]73-catherine by talking of such things . [Mr. Morland]103-james has behaved so very handsome , [you]266-her daughter know . [I]96-mrs. thorpe always heard [he]103-james was [a most excellent man]2959-a most excellent man ; and [you]266-her daughter know , [[my]96-mrs. thorpe dear]2185-my dear , [we]2957-us are not to suppose but what , if [you]266-her daughter had had a suitable fortune , [he]103-james would have come down with something more , for [I]96-mrs. thorpe am sure [he]103-james must be [a most liberal - minded man]2961-a most liberal - minded man . ”[96-mrs. thorpe]

“ [Nobody]2205-nobody can think better of [Mr. Morland]103-james than [I]96-mrs. thorpe do , [I]96-mrs. thorpe am sure . But [everybody]318-everybody has [their]318-everybody failing , [you]266-her daughter know , and [everybody]318-everybody has a right to do what [they]318-everybody like with [their]318-everybody own money . ”[96-mrs. thorpe]

[Catherine]73-catherine was hurt by these insinuations . “ [I]1134-i am very sure , ”[1134-i] said [she]1134-i , “ that [[my]1134-i father]2538-my father has promised to do as much as [he]2538-my father can afford . ”[1134-i]

[Isabella]101-isabella recollected [herself]101-isabella . “ As to that , [my]101-isabella sweet [Catherine]73-catherine , there can not be a doubt , and [you]73-catherine know [me]101-isabella well enough to be sure that a much smaller income would satisfy [me]101-isabella . It is not the want of more money that makes [me]101-isabella just at present a little out of spirits ; [I]101-isabella hate money ; and if [our]2966-we union could take place now upon only fifty pounds a year , [I]101-isabella should not have a wish unsatisfied . Ah ! [[my]101-isabella [Catherine]73-catherine]2859-my catherine , [you]73-catherine have found [me]101-isabella out . There ’s the sting . The long , long , endless two years and a half that are to pass before [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother can hold the living . ”[101-isabella]

“ Yes , yes , [[my]96-mrs. thorpe darling]2969-my darling [Isabella]101-isabella , ”[96-mrs. thorpe] said [Mrs. Thorpe]96-mrs. thorpe , “ [we]2966-we perfectly see into [your]101-isabella heart . [You]101-isabella have no disguise . [We]2966-we perfectly understand the present vexation ; and [everybody]318-everybody must love [you]101-isabella the better for such a noble honest affection . ”[96-mrs. thorpe]

[Catherine]73-catherine ’s uncomfortable feelings began to lessen . [She]1135-her endeavoured to believe that the delay of the marriage was the only source of [Isabella]101-isabella ’s regret ; and when [she]1135-her saw [her]101-isabella at [their]1136-their next interview as cheerful and amiable as ever , endeavoured to forget that [she]1135-her had for a minute thought otherwise . [James]103-james soon followed [his]103-james letter , and was received with the most gratifying kindness .

CHAPTER 17

[The Allens]104-the allens had now entered on the sixth week of [their]104-the allens stay in [Bath]5-bath ; and whether it should be the last was for some time a question , to which [Catherine]73-catherine listened with a beating heart . To have [her]1135-her acquaintance with [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys end so soon was an evil which nothing could counterbalance . [Her]1135-her whole happiness seemed at stake , while the affair was in suspense , and everything secured when it was determined that [the lodgings]1137-the lodgings should be taken for another fortnight . What this additional fortnight was to produce to [her]1135-her beyond the pleasure of sometimes seeing [Henry Tilney]92-henry made but a small part of [Catherine]73-catherine ’s speculation . Once or twice indeed , since [James]103-james ’s engagement had taught [her]1135-her what _ could _ be done , [she]1135-her had got so far as to indulge in a secret “ perhaps , ”[103-james] but in general the felicity of being with [him]103-james for the present bounded [her]1135-her views : the present was now comprised in another three weeks , and [her]1135-her happiness being certain for that period , the rest of [her]1135-her life was at such a distance as to excite but little interest . In the course of the morning which saw this business arranged , [she]1135-her visited [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney , and poured forth [her]1135-her joyful feelings . It was doomed to be a day of trial . No sooner had [she]1135-her expressed [her]1135-her delight in [Mr. Allen]83-mr. allen ’s lengthened stay than [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney told [her]1135-her of [[her]1135-her father]182-her father ’s having just determined upon quitting [Bath]5-bath by the end of another week . Here was a blow ! the past suspense of the morning had been ease and quiet to the present disappointment . [Catherine]73-catherine ’s countenance fell , and in a voice of most sincere concern [she]1135-her echoed [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney ’s concluding words , “ By the end of another week ! ”[1135-her]

“ Yes , [[my]1135-her father]2538-my father can seldom be prevailed on to give the waters what [I]1135-her think a fair trial . [He]2538-my father has been disappointed of [some friends]2647-some friends ’ arrival whom [he]2538-my father expected to meet [here]280-here , and as [he]2538-my father is now pretty well , is in a hurry to get [home]2403-home . ”[1135-her]

“ [I]73-catherine am very sorry for it , ”[73-catherine] said [Catherine]73-catherine dejectedly ; “ if [I]73-catherine had known this before — ”[73-catherine]

“ Perhaps , ”[90-miss tilney] said [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney in an embarrassed manner , “ [you]73-catherine would be so good — it would make [me]90-miss tilney very happy if — ”[90-miss tilney]

The entrance of [[her]1135-her father]182-her father put a stop to the civility , which [Catherine]73-catherine was beginning to hope might introduce a desire of [[their]1140-their corresponding]1141-their corresponding . After addressing [her]1135-her with [his]182-her father usual politeness , [he]182-her father turned to [[his]182-her father daughter]2509-his daughter and said , “ Well , [Eleanor]142-eleanor , may [I]182-her father congratulate [you]142-eleanor on being successful in [your]142-eleanor application to [[your]142-eleanor fair friend]2975-your fair friend ? ”[182-her father]

“ [I]182-her father was just beginning to make the request , [sir]2221-sir , as [you]2221-sir came in . ”[182-her father]

“ Well , proceed by all means . [I]182-her father know how much [your]142-eleanor heart is in it . [[My]182-her father daughter]2977-my daughter , [Miss Morland]84-miss morland , ”[182-her father] [he]182-her father continued , without leaving [[his]182-her father daughter]2509-his daughter time to speak , “ has been forming a very bold wish . [We]2978-we leave [Bath]5-bath , as [she]2975-your fair friend has perhaps told [you]142-eleanor , on Saturday se’nnight . A letter from [[my]182-her father steward]2979-my steward tells [me]182-her father that [my]182-her father presence is wanted at [home]2403-home ; and being disappointed in [my]182-her father hope of seeing [the Marquis of [Longtown]58-longtown]2981-the marquis of longtown and General Courteney here , [some of [[my]182-her father very old friends]2983-my very old friends]2982-some of my very old friends , there is nothing to detain [me]182-her father longer in [Bath]5-bath . And could [we]2978-we carry [our]2978-we selfish point with [you]142-eleanor , [we]2978-we should leave it without a single regret . Can [you]142-eleanor , in short , be prevailed on to quit this scene of public triumph and oblige [[your]142-eleanor friend]2772-your friend [Eleanor]142-eleanor with [your]142-eleanor company in [Gloucestershire]9-gloucestershire ? [I]182-her father am almost ashamed to make the request , though its presumption would certainly appear greater to every creature in [Bath]5-bath than [yourself]142-eleanor . Modesty such as [yours]142-eleanor — but not for [the world]191-the world would [I]182-her father pain it by open praise . If [you]142-eleanor can be induced to honour [us]2978-we with a visit , [you]142-eleanor will make [us]2978-we happy beyond expression . ’ Tis true , [we]2978-we can offer [you]142-eleanor nothing like the gaieties of [this lively place]2986-this lively place ; [we]2978-we can tempt [you]142-eleanor neither by amusement nor splendour , for [our]2978-we mode of living , as [you]142-eleanor see , is plain and unpretending ; yet no endeavours shall be wanting on [our]2978-we side to make [Northanger Abbey]1-northanger abbey not wholly disagreeable . ”[182-her father]

[Northanger Abbey]1-northanger abbey ! these were thrilling words , and wound up [Catherine]73-catherine ’s feelings to the highest point of ecstasy . [Her]1144-her grateful and gratified heart could hardly restrain its expressions within the language of tolerable calmness . To receive so flattering an invitation ! to have [her]1144-her company so warmly solicited ! everything honourable and soothing , every present enjoyment , and every future hope was contained in it ; and [her]1144-her acceptance , with only the saving clause of [Papa]136-papa and [Mamma]137-mamma ’s approbation , was eagerly given . “ [I]1144-her will write [home]2403-home directly , ”[1144-her] said [she]1144-her , “ and if [they]1145-her excellent friends do not object , as [I]1144-her dare say [they]1145-her excellent friends will not — ”[1144-her]

[General Tilney]138-general tilney was not less sanguine , having already waited on [[her]1144-her excellent friends]1145-her excellent friends in [Pulteney Street]7-pulteney street , and obtained [their]1145-her excellent friends sanction of [his]138-general tilney wishes . “ Since [they]1145-her excellent friends can consent to part with [you]1144-her , ”[138-general tilney] said [he]138-general tilney , “ [we]2988-we may expect philosophy from all [the world]191-the world . ”[138-general tilney]

[Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney was earnest , though gentle , in [her]1144-her secondary civilities , and the affair became in a few minutes as nearly settled as this necessary reference to [Fullerton]3-fullerton would allow .

The circumstances of the morning had led [Catherine]73-catherine ’s feelings through the varieties of suspense , security , and disappointment ; but they were now safely lodged in perfect bliss ; and with spirits elated to rapture , with [Henry]92-henry at [her]1144-her heart , and [Northanger Abbey]1-northanger abbey on [her]1144-her lips , [she]1144-her hurried [home]2403-home to write [her]1144-her letter . [Mr.]1147-mr. and [Mrs. Morland]78-mrs. morland , relying on the discretion of [the friends to whom [they]1148-the friends to whom they had already entrusted their daughter had already entrusted [[their]1148-the friends to whom they had already entrusted their daughter daughter]1149-their daughter]1148-the friends to whom they had already entrusted their daughter , felt no doubt of the propriety of an acquaintance which had been formed under [their]1148-the friends to whom they had already entrusted their daughter eye , and sent therefore by return of post [their]1148-the friends to whom they had already entrusted their daughter ready consent to [her]1149-their daughter visit in [Gloucestershire]9-gloucestershire . This indulgence , though not more than [Catherine]73-catherine had hoped for , completed [her]1149-their daughter conviction of being favoured beyond [every other human creature]1150-every other human creature , in [friends]2791-friends and fortune , circumstance and chance . Everything seemed to cooperate for [her]1149-their daughter advantage . By the kindness of [[her]1149-their daughter first friends]1152-her first friends , [the Allens]104-the allens , [she]1149-their daughter had been introduced into scenes where pleasures of every kind had met [her]1149-their daughter . [Her]1149-their daughter feelings , [her]1149-their daughter preferences , had each known the happiness of a return . Wherever [she]1149-their daughter felt attachment , [she]1149-their daughter had been able to create it . The affection of [Isabella]101-isabella was to be secured to [her]1149-their daughter in [a sister]631-a sister . [The Tilneys]132-the tilneys , [they]132-the tilneys , by whom , above all , [she]1149-their daughter desired to be favourably thought of , outstripped even [her]1149-their daughter wishes in the flattering measures by which [their]132-the tilneys intimacy was to be continued . [She]1149-their daughter was to be [[their]132-the tilneys chosen visitor]1154-their chosen visitor , [she]1149-their daughter was to be for weeks under the same roof with [the person whose society [she]1149-their daughter mostly prized]1155-the person whose society she mostly prized — and , in addition to all the rest , this roof was to be [the roof of [an abbey]1157-an abbey]1156-the roof of an abbey ! [her]1149-their daughter passion for ancient edifices was next in degree to [her]1149-their daughter passion for [Henry Tilney]92-henry — and [castles]1158-castles and [abbeys]1159-abbeys made usually the charm of those reveries which [his]92-henry image did not fill . To see and explore either the ramparts and keep of the one , or the cloisters of the other , had been for many weeks a darling wish , though to be more than [the visitor of an hour]1160-the visitor of an hour had seemed too nearly impossible for desire . And yet , this was to happen . With all the chances against [her]1149-their daughter of [house]2569-house , [hall]1162-hall , [place]1163-place , [park]1164-park , [court]1165-court , and [cottage]1166-cottage , [Northanger]60-northanger turned up [an abbey]1157-an abbey , and [she]1149-their daughter was to be [its inhabitant]1168-its inhabitant . [[Its]1157-an abbey long , damp passages]1169-its long , damp passages , [[its]1157-an abbey narrow cells and [ruined chapel]1171-ruined chapel]1170-its narrow cells and ruined chapel , were to be within [her]1149-their daughter daily reach , and [she]1149-their daughter could not entirely subdue the hope of some traditional legends , some awful memorials of [an injured and ill - fated nun]1172-an injured and ill - fated nun .

It was wonderful that [[her]1149-their daughter friends]809-her friends should seem so little elated by the possession of such [a home]1174-a home , that the consciousness of it should be so meekly borne . The power of early habit only could account for it . A distinction to which [they]809-her friends had been born gave no pride . [Their]809-her friends superiority of [abode]1175-abode was no more to [them]809-her friends than [their]809-her friends superiority of [person]1176-person .

Many were the inquiries [she]1149-their daughter was eager to make of [Miss Tilney]90-miss tilney ; but so active were [her]1149-their daughter thoughts , that when these inquiries were answered , [she]1149-their daughter was hardly more assured than before , of [Northanger Abbey]1-northanger abbey having been [a richly endowed convent at the time of [the Reformation]1178-the reformation]1177-a richly endowed convent at the time of the reformation , of [its]1-northanger abbey having fallen into the hands of [an ancestor of [the Tilneys]132-the tilneys on [its]1-northanger abbey dissolution]1179-an ancestor of the tilneys on its dissolution , of a large portion of [the ancient building]1180-the ancient building still making a part of [the present dwelling]1181-the present dwelling although the rest was decayed , or of [its]1-northanger abbey standing low in [a valley]1182-a valley , sheltered from [the north and east by rising woods of oak]1183-the north and east by rising woods of oak .

CHAPTER 18

With a mind thus full of happiness , [Catherine]73-catherine was hardly aware that two or three days had passed away , without [her]1149-their daughter seeing [Isabella]101-isabella for more than a few minutes together . [She]1149-their daughter began first to be sensible of this , and to sigh for [her]1149-their daughter conversation , as [she]1149-their daughter walked along [the pump - room]357-the pump - room one morning , by [Mrs. Allen]86-mrs. allen ’s side , without anything to say or to hear ; and scarcely had [she]1149-their daughter felt a five minutes ’ longing of friendship , before the object of it appeared , and inviting [her]1149-their daughter to a secret conference , led the way to a seat . “ This is [[my]1149-their daughter favourite place]2990-my favourite place , ”[1149-their daughter] said [she]1149-their daughter as [they]1185-they sat down on a bench between the doors , which commanded a tolerable view of [everybody entering at either]1186-everybody entering at either ; “ [it]2990-my favourite place is so out of the way . ”[1149-their daughter]

[Catherine]73-catherine , observing that [Isabella]101-isabella ’s eyes were continually bent towards one door or the other , as in eager expectation , and remembering how often [she]1149-their daughter had been falsely accused of being arch , thought the present a fine opportunity for being really so ; and therefore gaily said , “ Do not be uneasy , [Isabella]101-isabella , [James]103-james will soon be [here]280-here . ”[73-catherine]

“ Psha ! [[my]1149-their daughter dear creature]2394-my dear creature , ”[1149-their daughter] [she]1149-their daughter replied , “ do not think [me]1149-their daughter such a simpleton as to be always wanting to confine [him]103-james to [my]1149-their daughter elbow . It would be hideous to be always together ; [we]1185-they should be the jest of [the place]2220-the place . And so [you]101-isabella are going to [Northanger]60-northanger ! [i]1149-their daughter am amazingly glad of [it]60-northanger . [It]60-northanger is [one of [the finest old places in [England]2-england]2995-the finest old places in england]2994-one of the finest old places in england , [I]1149-their daughter understand . [I]1149-their daughter shall depend upon a most particular description of [it]60-northanger . ”[1149-their daughter]

“ [You]101-isabella shall certainly have the best in [my]73-catherine power to give . But who are [you]101-isabella looking for ? Are [[your]101-isabella sisters]2996-your sisters coming ? ”[73-catherine]

“ [I]1149-their daughter am not looking for [anybody]192-anybody . [One]160-one ’s eyes must be somewhere , and [you]101-isabella know what a foolish trick [I]1149-their daughter have of fixing [mine]1149-their daughter , when [my]1149-their daughter thoughts are an hundred miles off . [I]1149-their daughter am amazingly absent ; [I]1149-their daughter believe [I]1149-their daughter am the most absent creature in [the world]191-the world . [Tilney]90-miss tilney says it is always the case with [minds of a certain stamp]2999-minds of a certain stamp . ”[1149-their daughter]

“ But [I]73-catherine thought , [Isabella]101-isabella , [you]101-isabella had something in particular to tell [me]73-catherine ? ”[73-catherine]

“ Oh yes , and so [I]1149-their daughter have . But here is a proof of what [I]1149-their daughter was saying . [My]1149-their daughter poor head , [I]1149-their daughter had quite forgot it . Well , the thing is this : [I]1149-their daughter have just had a letter from [John]97-john ; [you]101-isabella can guess the contents . ”[1149-their daughter]

“ No , indeed , [I]73-catherine can not . ”[73-catherine]

“ [[My]1149-their daughter sweet love]3000-my sweet love , do not be so abominably affected . What can [he]97-john write about , but [yourself]101-isabella ? [You]101-isabella know [he]97-john is over head and ears in love with [you]101-isabella . ”[1149-their daughter]

“ With _ [me]73-catherine _ , dear [Isabella]101-isabella ! ”[73-catherine]

“ Nay , [my]1149-their daughter sweetest [Catherine]73-catherine , this is being quite absurd ! modesty , and all that , is very well in its way , but really a little common honesty is sometimes quite as becoming . [I]1149-their daughter have no idea of being so overstrained ! it is fishing for compliments . [His]97-john attentions were such as [a child]3001-a child must have noticed . And it was but half an hour before [he]97-john left [Bath]5-bath that [you]101-isabella gave [him]97-john the most positive encouragement . [He]97-john says so in this letter , says that [he]97-john as good as made [you]101-isabella an offer , and that [you]101-isabella received [his]97-john advances in the kindest way ; and now [he]97-john wants [me]1149-their daughter to urge [his]97-john suit , and say all manner of pretty things to [you]101-isabella . So it is in vain to affect ignorance . ”[1149-their daughter]

[Catherine]73-catherine , with all the earnestness of truth , expressed [her]1187-i astonishment at such a charge , protesting [her]1187-i innocence of every thought of [Mr. Thorpe]119-mr. thorpe ’s being in love with [her]1187-i , and the consequent impossibility of [her]1187-i having ever intended to encourage [him]119-mr. thorpe . “ As to any attentions on [his]97-john side , [I]1187-i do declare , upon [my]1187-i honour , [I]1187-i never was sensible of [them]3002-them for a moment — except just [his]97-john asking [me]1187-i to dance the first day of [his]97-john coming . And as to making [me]1187-i an offer , or anything like it , there must be some unaccountable mistake . [I]1187-i could not have misunderstood a thing of that kind , [you]101-isabella know ! and , as [I]1187-i ever wish to be believed , [I]1187-i solemnly protest that no syllable of such a nature ever passed between [us]3003-us . The last half hour before [he]97-john went away ! it must be all and completely a mistake — for [I]1187-i did not see [him]97-john once that whole morning . ”[1187-i]

“ But _ that _ [you]101-isabella certainly did , for [you]101-isabella spent the whole morning in [[Edgar]116-edgar ’s Buildings]2345-edgar ’s buildings — it was the day [[your]101-isabella father]2706-your father ’s consent came — and [I]1149-their daughter am pretty sure that [you]101-isabella and [John]97-john were alone in [the parlour]1015-the parlour some time before [you]101-isabella left [the house]211-the house . ”[1149-their daughter]

“ Are [you]101-isabella ? Well , if [you]101-isabella say it , it was so , [I]101-isabella dare say — but for the life of [me]101-isabella , [I]101-isabella can not recollect it . [I]101-isabella _ do _ remember now being with [you]101-isabella , and seeing [him]97-john as well as [the rest]319-the rest — but that [we]3009-we were ever alone for five minutes — However , it is not worth arguing about , for whatever might pass on [his]97-john side , [you]101-isabella must be convinced , by [my]101-isabella having no recollection of it , that [I]101-isabella never thought , nor expected , nor wished for anything of the kind from [him]97-john . [I]101-isabella am excessively concerned that [he]97-john should have any regard for [me]101-isabella — but indeed it has been quite unintentional on [my]101-isabella side ; [I]101-isabella never had the smallest idea of it . Pray undeceive [him]97-john as soon as [you]101-isabella can , and tell [him]97-john [I]101-isabella beg [his]97-john pardon — that is — [I]101-isabella do not know what [I]101-isabella ought to say — but make [him]97-john understand what [I]101-isabella mean , in the properest way . [I]101-isabella would not speak disrespectfully of [a brother of yours]3010-a brother of yours , [Isabella]101-isabella , [I]101-isabella am sure ; but [you]101-isabella know very well that if [I]101-isabella could think of [one man]3011-one man more than another—_he _ is not [the person]2765-the person . ”[101-isabella] [Isabella]101-isabella was silent . “ [[My]101-isabella dear friend]3013-my dear friend , [you]101-isabella must not be angry with [me]101-isabella . [I]101-isabella can not suppose [[your]101-isabella brother]2395-your brother cares so very much about [me]101-isabella . And , [you]101-isabella know , [we]3015-we shall still be [sisters]410-sisters . ”[101-isabella]

“ Yes , yes ”[1149-their daughter] ( with a blush ) , “ there are more ways than [one of [our]3015-we being [sisters]410-sisters]3017-one of our being sisters . But where am [I]1149-their daughter wandering to ? Well , [[my]1149-their daughter dear]2185-my dear [Catherine]73-catherine , the case seems to be that [you]101-isabella are determined against poor [John]97-john — is not it so ? ”[1149-their daughter]

“ [I]101-isabella certainly can not return [his]97-john affection , and as certainly never meant to encourage it . ”[101-isabella]

“ Since that is the case , [I]1149-their daughter am sure [I]1149-their daughter shall not tease [you]73-catherine any further . [John]97-john desired [me]1149-their daughter to speak to [you]73-catherine on the subject , and therefore [I]1149-their daughter have . But [I]1149-their daughter confess , as soon as [I]1149-their daughter read [his]97-john letter , [I]1149-their daughter thought it a very foolish , imprudent business , and not likely to promote the good of either ; for what were [you]73-catherine to live upon , supposing [you]73-catherine came together ? [You]73-catherine have both of [you]73-catherine something , to be sure , but it is not a trifle that will support [a family]2631-a family nowadays ; and after all that [romancers]3021-romancers may say , there is no doing without money . [I]1149-their daughter only wonder [John]97-john could think of it ; [he]97-john could not have received [my]1149-their daughter last . ”[1149-their daughter]

“ [You]73-catherine _ do _ acquit [me]101-isabella , then , of anything [wrong?—You]73-catherine are convinced that [I]101-isabella never meant to deceive [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother , never suspected [him]2395-your brother of liking [me]101-isabella till this moment ? ”[101-isabella]

“ Oh ! as to that , ”[101-isabella] answered [Isabella]101-isabella laughingly , “ [I]101-isabella do not pretend to determine what [your]73-catherine thoughts and designs in time past may have been . All that is best known to [yourself]73-catherine . A little harmless flirtation or so will occur , and [one]2201-one is often drawn on to give more encouragement than [one]2201-one wishes to stand by . But [you]73-catherine may be assured that [I]101-isabella am [the last person in [the world]191-the world]3025-the last person in the world to judge [you]73-catherine severely . All those things should be allowed for in youth and high spirits . What one means one day , [you]73-catherine know , [one]2201-one may not mean the next . Circumstances change , opinions alter . ”[101-isabella]

“ But [my]101-isabella opinion of [[your]73-catherine brother]2395-your brother never did alter ; it was always the same . [You]73-catherine are describing what never happened . ”[101-isabella]

“ [[My]412-the other dearest]2292-my dearest [Catherine]73-catherine , ”[412-the other] continued [the other]412-the other without at all listening to [her]1189-her , “ [I]412-the other would not for all [the world]191-the world be the means of hurrying [you]73-catherine into an engagement before [you]73-catherine knew what [you]73-catherine were about . [I]412-the other do not think anything would justify [me]412-the other in wishing [you]73-catherine to sacrifice all [your]73-catherine happiness merely to oblige [[my]412-the other brother]2349-my brother , because [he]2349-my brother is [[my]412-the other brother]2349-my brother , and who perhaps after all , [you]73-catherine know , might be just as happy without [you]73-catherine , for [people]320-people seldom know what [they]320-people would be at , [young men]532-young men especially , [they]320-people are so amazingly changeable and inconstant . What [I]412-the other say is , why should [a brother]767-a brother ’s happiness be dearer to [me]412-the other than [a friend]446-a friend ’s ? [You]73-catherine know [I]412-the other carry [my]412-the other notions of friendship pretty high . But , above all things , [[my]412-the other dear]2185-my dear [Catherine]73-catherine , do not be in a hurry . Take [my]412-the other word for it , that if [you]73-catherine are in too great a hurry , [you]73-catherine will certainly live to repent it . [Tilney]90-miss tilney says there is nothing [people]320-people are so often deceived in as the state of [their]320-people own affections , and [I]412-the other believe [he]90-miss tilney is very right . Ah ! here [he]90-miss tilney comes ; never mind , [he]90-miss tilney will not see [us]3039-us , [I]412-the other am sure . ”[412-the other]

[Catherine]73-catherine , looking up , perceived [Captain Tilney]74-captain tilney ; and [Isabella]101-isabella , earnestly fixing [her]101-isabella eye on [him]74-captain tilney as [she]101-isabella spoke , soon caught [his]74-captain tilney notice .
